Product Overview.Overview: The 451 Research Data Center Knowledge Base is a comprehensive global database offering unparalleled insights into the data center market. Encompassing over 12,900 facilities across 112 countries and 361 markets, this dataset provides granular, site-level information with over 100 data points per facility.  It delivers both current snapshots and historical trends of capacity and utilization, enabling users to analyze market growth, assess competitive landscapes, evaluate energy dynamics, and identify strategic opportunities within the data center ecosystem.

Key Features.Description: Access detailed information on over 12,900 data center facilities worldwide, spanning 112 countries and 361 markets for comprehensive global analysis.
Explore data on various data center types including Hyperscale, Leased, Crypto, colocation, and wholesale facilities to understand different market segments.
Gain quarterly site- and market-level insights into data center capacity, utilization rates, and revenue to track market dynamics and performance.
Monitor new data center builds, facilities under construction, and expansion pipelines to anticipate future market developments and opportunities.
Analyze power utilization, operational space, and data center density metrics for operational benchmarking and efficiency analysis.
Evaluate data center certifications, environmental ratings, and regional market segmentation to incorporate sustainability considerations into market assessments.
Utilize historical data dating back to 2010 to analyze past market trends and predict future datacenter growth patterns.
Leverage over 100 data points per facility, providing a deep and detailed understanding of each data center's characteristics and operational details.

Leveraging expert market insights, end-user surveys, forecast modeling, and more, the platform delivers a unique blend of quantitative and qualitative research. Product Overview.Overview: The ABX Index is a synthetic, tradable index designed to track the performance of the subprime residential mortgage-backed securities (RMBS) market. Composed of a basket of 20 subprime mortgage-backed securities, it serves as a crucial tool for market participants to assess market sentiment, gauge liquidity, and make informed investment decisions regarding this asset class. Its standardized construction and transparent pricing provide investors with the ability to take both short and long positions, making it an essential instrument for navigating the subprime RMBS market.

Key Features.Description: Daily composite levels allow investors to monitor and understand shifts in subprime RMBS market sentiment effectively.
The index and associated PV calculator enhance understanding of liquidity within the subprime RMBS market.
Rely on a consistent and standardized selection process for reference obligations, ensuring uniformity and predictability.
Benefit from an objective, rules-based index construction and publicly available daily closing prices for enhanced transparency.
Utilize standardized contract documentation and readily available payment amount calculations, posted monthly for ease of use.
Effectively evaluate the performance of subprime residential mortgage-backed securities using this benchmark index.
The synthetic nature of the index allows market participants to take both long and short positions, facilitating diverse investment strategies.
Provides tools and insights necessary for managing risk exposure in the subprime mortgage-backed securities sector.

Product Overview.Overview: The Asset Manager Practices Classification (AMPC) is an opinion provided by S&P Global Ratings on the overall quality of an asset management company. It assesses a firm's management and operational procedures, focusing on the investment process, systems, and controls in comparison to industry peers.  The AMPC is designed to benchmark asset manager practices and is not a credit rating or an audit.

Key Features.Description: Classifications range from 'AMP-1' (Very Strong) to 'AMP-5' (Weak), providing a clear and concise assessment of asset manager practices.
Delivered with a comprehensive written report, available for public or confidential distribution depending on client needs.
Enables asset managers to effectively compare their operational and investment practices against those of other market participants.
S&P Global Ratings conducts a thorough examination of an asset manager's resources, investment management process, risk management systems, and daily operating procedures.
The AMPC relies on information supplied by the asset management company and other reliable sources to ensure a robust evaluation.
Provides an opinion on the quality of practices, distinct from legal compliance audits or opinions on regulatory adherence.
Specifically excludes opinions on fund performance, suitability, or the safety of assets held by the asset manager, ensuring focus on operational practices.
The classification is not a recommendation to use the services of any particular asset manager, but rather an objective assessment of their practices.

Product Overview.Overview: The Asset Valuation dataset from S&P Commodity Insights offers comprehensive global coverage of production, cost, and economic data essential for valuing over 18,000 upstream oil and gas assets worldwide.  Spanning the entire asset lifecycle from discovery to decommissioning, this dataset utilizes exploration and production technical data, Que$tor cost inputs, and fiscal tools to enable users to screen, rank, and compare assets based on performance, breakeven prices, and valuations across various price scenarios. It provides a transparent, bottom-up analysis for robust economic evaluations and informed decision-making in the energy sector.

Key Features.Description: Access worldwide production, cost, and economic data for comprehensive asset valuation.
Provides data spanning from asset discovery to decommissioning for complete lifecycle assessments.
Specifically designed and structured for detailed economic valuation of oil and gas assets.
Analyze asset performance and valuation under three different price scenarios (real or nominal cash orientation).
Effectively screen, rank, and compare assets and portfolios based on key performance indicators.
Leverage a transparent, bottom-up analysis approach for reliable and auditable economic evaluations.
Utilize company hierarchy data to accurately build out and analyze company shares in assets.
Gain access to asset and project-specific analytical remarks for a deeper understanding of asset nuances and performance drivers.

AutoCreditInsight™ empowers automotive businesses to formulate strong sales strategies, analyze market share, understand customer loyalty, and optimize pricing and dealer performance through access to detailed loan and credit information.

Key Features.Description: Access census-level credit details at granular levels like zip code, enabling precise market analysis beyond state or national averages.

Product Overview.Overview: Cappitech's Platform is a comprehensive regulatory reporting solution designed to streamline compliance across multiple jurisdictions. It consolidates all your regulatory needs into a single platform, offering features such as best execution monitoring, delegated reporting, and reconciliation.  The platform ensures improved accuracy and timeliness in transaction reporting, while providing a user-friendly dashboard for transparency and actionable insights. Built with innovative technology, Cappitech aims to lower the cost of ownership and simplify regulatory complexities for financial firms.

Key Features.Description: Manage all aspects of your regulatory reporting, including transaction reporting, delegated reporting, best execution monitoring, reconciliation, and pairing & matching, all within a single platform.
Automate your reporting submissions, significantly reducing manual effort and improving accuracy by benchmarking your compliance KPIs and identifying areas for rectification.

Leverage a scalable SaaS solution built to handle large transaction volumes and seamlessly integrate across various trading platforms, file types, and formats, adapting to your evolving needs.
Lower your overall transaction reporting expenses through automation, faster onboarding, and a consolidated platform that reduces operational overhead and saves valuable time.
Go beyond basic reporting with instant insights derived from compliance and market data, empowering you to make data-driven decisions that positively impact your bottom line.
Benefit from deep domain expertise with access to regulatory experts who actively monitor your reporting, provide guidance, and swiftly resolve any reporting issues, ensuring continuous compliance.

Product Overview.Overview: The Carbon Accounting: Automotive dataset delivers a comprehensive assessment of greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions throughout the lifecycle of road vehicles, from production to operation. This dataset is essential for financial institutions needing to evaluate financed emissions and for industrial companies aiming to measure and manage their net-zero pathways. By providing granular analysis at the vehicle-specific level, and adhering to Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF) rules, it addresses the significant environmental impact of the automotive sector, offering crucial insights for emissions disclosure and reduction strategies.

Key Features.Description: Access comprehensive data spanning across the globe.
Includes data from over 120 key automotive companies.
Leverage forecasts extending up to 2050 for long-term planning.
Analyze emissions based on specific vehicle powertrain types.
Incorporates both assumed and measured lifetime mileage of vehicles.
Provides a breakdown of upstream and tailpipe CO2 emissions.
Data granularity and methodology are aligned with Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF) rules.
Facilitates accurate and comprehensive GHG emission disclosures for financial and industrial sectors.

Product Overview.Overview: Carbon Markets Alert is a real-time service delivering critical news, pricing, and expert analysis for global carbon markets. Leveraging specialist knowledge, it provides independent carbon price assessments, indices, and industry-leading insights into market dynamics and real-time news. This service enhances transparency and efficiency in the rapidly evolving carbon markets, empowering users to make informed business decisions with clarity and confidence.

Key Features.Description: Stay ahead of the curve with up-to-the-minute news and intelligence on global and regional carbon markets, enabling you to seize opportunities promptly.
Access crucial, up-to-the-minute pricing information and indices in multiple currencies for informed sales and purchasing decisions and enhanced global transparency.

Product Overview.Overview: CARFAX, a part of S&P Global, is the leading provider of trusted vehicle history information, empowering millions to make confident decisions when shopping, buying, servicing, and selling cars.  With the most comprehensive vehicle history database in North America, CARFAX compiles data from over 151,000 sources to generate detailed Vehicle History Reports using a car's VIN. These reports reveal critical information such as accident history, title issues, odometer readings, service records, and more, ensuring transparency and reducing risks for consumers and businesses in the automotive industry.

Key Features.Description: Access detailed reports compiled from over 35 billion records, providing a deep dive into a vehicle's past.
Identify potential accident history, including severity and impact details, to assess vehicle safety.
Uncover critical title issues like salvage, junk, flood damage, and odometer discrepancies before you buy.
Check for potential mileage rollbacks and ensure the accuracy of a vehicle's reported mileage.
Review maintenance history to understand vehicle care and anticipate future service needs.
Reduce risk with protection against undisclosed DMV-issued branded titles (terms apply).
Simplify car shopping by finding used cars with desirable histories and instantly access free CARFAX Reports.
Key Features.Feature: Used Car Listings with Free Reports

Key Features.Description: Manage vehicle maintenance with service schedules, recall alerts, and easy access to your car's history on your mobile device.

Product Overview.Overview: CARFAX Canada is dedicated to fostering trust and transparency within the automotive industry by providing Canadians with comprehensive vehicle history reports and valuation tools. Leveraging billions of data records from numerous sources, CARFAX Canada empowers consumers and businesses to make informed decisions when buying or selling used vehicles.  With over 20 years of experience, they are committed to delivering objective, transparent, and customer-centric solutions, driven by a mission to provide peace of mind and facilitate better vehicle-related choices for millions of Canadians.

Key Features.Description: Access in-depth reports drawing from billions of data records to understand a vehicle's past.
Utilize tools like Vehicle Valuation Report and History-Based Value for accurate assessments of car worth.

Benefit from over 20 years of experience serving the Canadian automotive market.

Product Overview.Overview: The CDO Suite of Models from S&P Global Ratings offers a comprehensive set of analytical tools for credit, cash flow, and detailed asset analysis of structured finance transactions. This suite includes CDO Evaluator, CDO Monitor, and Cash Flow Evaluator, each designed to provide in-depth insights for assessing credit risk and performance under various market conditions. Utilized by S&P Global Ratings themselves, these models are available in both user-friendly desktop applications and engine versions for programmatic integration, catering to diverse analytical needs within the structured finance industry.

Key Features.Description: CDO Evaluator assesses credit risk across a broad spectrum of asset types, including corporate, structured finance, and sovereign debt, employing methodologies used by S&P Global Ratings.

Cash Flow Evaluator applies a wide range of stress scenarios, such as defaults, recoveries, and interest rate movements, to evaluate the cash flow performance of structured transactions under adverse conditions.
CDO Monitor, built upon the CDO Evaluator model, enables continuous monitoring of CLO portfolios, ensuring ongoing compliance with initial rating parameters throughout reinvestment periods.
Choose between user-friendly desktop applications with Excel interfaces or engine versions for seamless programmatic integration into existing systems and workflows.
Leverage models based on the rigorous methodologies employed by S&P Global Ratings, ensuring alignment with industry best practices and credible analysis.
CDO Evaluator supports a diverse range of asset classes, including ABS, CMBS, RMBS, and specialized structures like CCOs and FX CDOs, providing broad applicability.
Cash Flow Evaluator specifically focuses on in-depth analysis of cash flow dynamics, providing critical insights into the performance and resilience of structured transactions.
Engine versions, utilizing XML for input/output and built with C++, offer enhanced flexibility for customization and integration into sophisticated analytical environments.

Product Overview.Overview: The CDO Suite of Models from S&P Global Ratings offers comprehensive analytical modeling and data capabilities for in-depth credit, cash flow, and asset analyses.  This suite includes the CDO Evaluator, CDO Monitor, and Cash Flow Evaluator models, designed to assess credit risk and simulate portfolio performance under various stress scenarios across a wide range of asset classes, including corporate, structured finance, and sovereign debt. These models are essential tools for understanding and managing risk in complex financial portfolios.

Key Features.Description: Perform detailed credit, cash flow, and asset analyses for informed decision-making.
Analyze diverse asset portfolios including corporate, structured finance, sovereign, and more, including specialized CDOs.
Evaluate the credit risk of portfolios to understand potential vulnerabilities.
Simulate portfolio default and loss rates under various stress scenarios to assess resilience.
Track CLO portfolio changes during reinvestment to maintain alignment with initial rating parameters.
Examine payment performance under stress to ensure timely and ultimate payments on rated securities.
Available as desktop applications with user-friendly Excel interfaces and engine versions for system integration.
Engine versions offer XML or C++ library interfaces for tailored integration and output.

Product Overview.Overview: The CDO Suite of Models provides a comprehensive set of analytical tools for professionals in structured finance and credit risk management. This suite includes CDO Evaluator, CDO Monitor, and Cash Flow Evaluator, each designed to offer unique capabilities for assessing credit risk, analyzing cash flows, and conducting detailed asset analyses.  These models are utilized for evaluating a wide range of asset types and structured transactions, offering both desktop applications with user-friendly interfaces and engine versions for programmatic integration, ensuring flexibility and depth in financial analysis.

Key Features.Description: CDO Evaluator assesses credit risk across diverse asset portfolios including corporate, structured finance, sovereign and more, enabling thorough risk evaluation.
CDO Evaluator simulates portfolio default and loss rates under various stress scenarios, aligned with different rating levels, for robust risk quantification and scenario planning.
CDO Monitor, based on CDO Evaluator, tracks CLO collateral portfolio changes against initial rating parameters during reinvestment periods, aiding in ongoing compliance and risk management.
Cash Flow Evaluator applies a range of stresses including defaults, recoveries, and interest rate movements to assess payment reliability in structured transactions under various economic conditions.
Offers both user-friendly desktop applications with Excel interfaces and engine versions for programmatic integration, catering to diverse user needs and technical environments.
Engine versions utilize XML for input and output, facilitating seamless integration with existing systems and automated processes for efficient workflows.
Models are accessible through Ratings360(R), providing a centralized platform for requesting and downloading models and streamlining access to essential tools.
Provides advanced analytical modeling and data capabilities, empowering users to perform sophisticated credit, cash flow, and asset analyses for informed decision-making.

Product Overview.Overview: The CDS Pricing dataset, sourced from IHS Markit, is the most extensive source of Credit Default Swap (CDS) data available in the market, providing independent pricing and liquidity metrics for CDS single names, indices, tranches, options, and sector curves. Widely utilized for price discovery, valuations, risk management, compliance, and research, this dataset delivers live, intraday, same-day, and end-of-day price updates sourced directly from market makers, offering comprehensive and reliable CDS pricing information.

Key Features.Description: Access pricing data for over 6000 CDS entities and 400 credit indices, providing a broad view of the CDS market.
Benefit from full global coverage, ensuring comprehensive data for international market analysis.
Leverage streaming, daily, and end-of-day price updates to suit various analytical and operational needs.
Access historical data stretching back to 2001, enabling long-term trend analysis and backtesting.

Rely on independent pricing data sourced from market makers for objective and transparent valuations.
Employ CDS pricing for price discovery, valuations, risk management, compliance, and research purposes.
Data is derived from dealer runs, clearing submissions, and books of records, ensuring high data quality and reliability.

Product Overview.Overview: The CDS to Equity Factors dataset, part of S&P Global Market Intelligence's Alpha Signals suite, leverages CDS Pricing data to deliver proprietary credit risk and momentum measures for equity investors. By linking Credit Default Swap (CDS) spread pricing to equity securities, this dataset bridges the credit and equity markets, offering unique insights derived from daily market prices of risk in the credit market. Equity investors can utilize this dataset to gain a point-in-time perspective on credit risk as it relates to equities and incorporate this new information into their trading and risk management strategies.

Key Features.Description: Provides current measures and changes in credit risk directly mapped to equity securities.
Offers measures for changes in the spread between long-term and short-term credit, giving insights into the term structure of risk.
Quantifies the divergence between CDS-implied equity returns and actual equity returns to pinpoint potential investment opportunities.
Utilizes a proprietary methodology to create unique credit risk and momentum factors.
Bridges the gap between credit and equity markets, providing a holistic view of risk.
Leverages daily market prices of risk from the CDS market for timely insights.
Seamlessly integrates within the Alpha Signals cross-asset factor suite for broader analysis.
Empowers equity investors with novel data to refine trading and risk management strategies.

Product Overview.Overview: CDX (Credit Default Swap) indices are a suite of benchmark instruments for trading credit risk in North American and emerging markets. These highly liquid and transparent indices cover various sectors, including investment grade, high yield, and emerging markets, offering broad market exposure through a single trade.  Rolling semi-annually in March and September and employing a rigorous selection methodology, CDX indices represent the most liquid segments of the credit market, facilitating efficient trading of tranches, options, and first-to-default baskets.

Key Features.Description: Execute large trades swiftly and confirm them electronically, streamlining your workflow.
Leverage extensive dealer and industry support, ensuring deep liquidity even during volatile market conditions.
Access standardized, well-documented indices with daily pricing readily available for all indices and characteristics.
Rely on a robust quality control process incorporating price contributions from leading financial institutions.
Gain exposure to North American and Emerging Markets credit markets through a comprehensive index family.
Access indices spanning Investment Grade, High Yield, and Emerging Market sectors for targeted strategies.
Benefit from semi-annual index rolls in March and September, maintaining market relevance and continuity.
Credit events are settled via auctions, ensuring a transparent and efficient resolution process.

Product Overview.Overview: The China Credit Analytics Platform is a comprehensive solution designed to empower corporations and financial institutions navigating the complexities of the Chinese market. Product Overview.Overview: ClariFI® is a modular quantitative investment management platform from S&P Global Market Intelligence. Key Features.Description: Control and manage every stage of a loan's lifecycle with integrated software, data, workflow applications, and managed services.
Automate key processes across origination, syndication, and post-execution, reducing manual work and improving efficiency.
Gain a clear, auditable view of all notices, calculations, and critical data across the entire loan lifecycle.
Access the largest global network of financial institutions, facilitating seamless communication and collaboration.
Minimize operational, credit, and covenant risks while ensuring adherence to regulatory obligations.
Improve settlement speeds, increase trade volume, and enhance liquidity in the loan market.
Navigate the complexities of both Broadly Syndicated Loans and Direct Lending markets with tailored tools and data.
Manage a wide range of loan portfolios, from simple bilateral deals to complex syndicated transactions, within a unified platform.

Product Overview.Overview: Client Lifecycle Management Pro is a lightweight, highly configurable, end-to-end solution designed to accelerate and simplify the entire client journey, from initial contract and onboarding to final account closure. By leveraging seamless integration, advanced automation, and world-class S&P Global data, it provides a transparent, efficient, and fully customizable platform that automates data collection and fulfills key regulatory, legal, KYC, and tax requirements with rapid implementation.

Climanomics is a risk analytics platform designed to calculate the financial impact of climate risk on physical assets and real estate investments globally. This solution aggregates risk up to the portfolio level and analyzes across eight decades under four emissions scenarios, providing comprehensive insights for any location worldwide. Climanomics supports various use cases, including risk management, sustainable investing, strategic decision-making, compliance, and reporting, empowering users to understand and address climate-related financial risks.

Key Features.Description: Leverages CMIP6 hazard modeling to provide physical climate risk analytics, with future updates including transition risk and opportunities analysis.
Delivers financial risk outputs in both relative and absolute terms, enabling clear understanding of potential financial impacts.
Analyzes eight key physical climate risks: Pluvial Flooding, Extreme Temperature, Coastal Flooding, Drought, Wildfire, Tropical Cyclone, Water Stress, and Fluvial Flooding.
Assesses climate risk under four Shared Socioeconomic Pathways (SSPs): SSP1-2.6, SSP2-4.5, SSP3-7.0, and SSP5-8.5, across an 80-year time horizon.
Incorporates climate change adaptation measures into risk modeling with 10 new impact functions applied to 23 asset types.
Includes landslide risk calculations for individual assets, a physical hazard recognized by the EU Taxonomy.
Offers exposure scores for proprietary assets, exportable via the Climanomics data export builder or the Exposure Score API.
Designed for risk management, sustainable investing, strategic decision-making, compliance, and reporting needs related to climate risk.

Product.Product Name: Climate and Environmental, Data and Analytics

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global's Climate and Environmental Datasets offer a comprehensive suite of information designed to empower informed decision-making for a sustainable future. These premium datasets provide in-depth insights into environmental footprints across carbon emissions, water dependency, pollution, and waste. They also deliver sector-specific metrics for nature, energy transition, and resource-intensive industries.  Furthermore, the datasets enable robust climate scenario analysis, assessing financial and physical risks, and evaluate alignment with key global frameworks like the Paris Agreement, EU Taxonomy, and SDGs.  With extensive coverage across companies, countries, and asset classes, and underpinned by a commitment to data quality, these datasets are essential for navigating the complexities of climate change and the transition to a low-carbon economy.

Key Features.Description: Gain a holistic view of environmental impact with detailed data on carbon emissions, water dependency, pollution, and waste disposal.
Deep dive into sector-specific climate risks and opportunities across nature, energy transition, and resource-intensive industries like metals and mining.
Assess financial and credit risks under different climate scenarios, including carbon pricing and physical climate impacts like sea level rise and extreme weather.
Evaluate alignment with Paris Agreement goals, EU Taxonomy for sustainable activities, and UN Sustainable Development Goals for transparent reporting.
Access data for a vast universe of over 20,000 companies, 99% of global market cap, sovereign bonds, fixed income, and private companies worldwide.
Rely on premium datasets backed by "The Quality Imperative" and S&P Global's 20+ years of experience in sustainability data and analysis.
Seamlessly integrate sustainability data with financial data and market intelligence through flexible delivery options like desktop, APIs, and data feeds.
Key Features.Feature: Integrated Data Solutions for Workflow Efficiency

Key Features.Description: Benefit from 24/7 expert support from ESG specialists and research analysts across S&P Global's global offices, ensuring you maximize the value of the datasets.

Product Overview.Overview: Climate Credit Analytics, developed in collaboration with Oliver Wyman, is a pioneering climate scenario analysis and credit analytics solution designed to help financial institutions and market participants evaluate the impact of the transition to a low-carbon economy and physical risk hazards on creditworthiness. This solution combines S&P Global Market Intelligence's extensive data resources with Oliver Wyman's climate expertise, offering both an Excel template for scenario analysis and web services for workflow integration. It empowers risk managers, investment professionals, and sustainability teams to assess climate-related credit risks and meet regulatory expectations by providing insights into stressed financials and credit scores under various climate scenarios.

Key Features.Description: Analyze creditworthiness under various climate scenarios, considering both the transition to a low-carbon economy and physical risk hazards.
Leverage a robust methodology for climate scenario application developed in partnership with Oliver Wyman.
Utilize S&P Global Market Intelligence's rich data resources, including company financials, industry data, emissions data, and physical asset risk data.
Access the solution through an Excel template for individual analysis or web services for seamless integration into existing workflows.
View stressed financials and corresponding credit scores for single entities or entire portfolios, enabling informed decision-making.
Address reporting requirements and incorporate industry-standard scenarios like NGFS, aiding in preparation for climate stress tests and financial stability regulations.
Integrate climate-based scenario analysis into existing systems and processes using web services for streamlined operations.
Designed for risk managers, investment professionals, and sustainability teams to effectively assess and manage climate-related credit risks.

Product Overview.Overview: Climate RiskGauge is a sophisticated climate scenario analysis tool designed to help users evaluate the financial implications of climate-related risks and opportunities across diverse investment portfolios. By employing a market-valuation approach, it estimates the impact of both climate transition and physical risks, ultimately projecting potential credit score changes for public and private companies. This tool supports informed decision-making by enabling users to understand and quantify the financial impacts of various climate scenarios on their assets, aligning with key regulatory and reporting frameworks.

Key Features.Description: Estimates financial impacts using market capitalization, financials, and projected emissions for credit score change predictions.
Applicable to a variety of asset classes including corporates, financial institutions, real estate, and sovereigns, with future expansion planned.
Accommodates diverse scenarios for stress testing and reporting, aligning with IEA, NGFS, and user-defined parameters.
Directly supports the Task Force on Climate-related Financial Disclosures (TCFD) recommendations for forward-looking scenario analysis.
Facilitates climate-related stress testing to meet increasing regulatory expectations for financial institutions.
Enables incorporation of climate risks into credit policies, procedures, and overall risk management strategies.
Provides climate risk-adjusted valuations for capital markets, M&A, and other corporate finance activities.
Tool and scenarios are continuously updated to reflect the latest climate-related risk trends and data.

Product Overview.Overview: The Climate Transition Assessment (CTA) offers a qualitative opinion on a company's journey towards a low-carbon, climate-resilient future. Going beyond net-zero targets, the CTA analyzes near-term actions, planned investments, and potential implementation risks to provide a forward-looking perspective.  Using the award-winning Shades of Green approach, it delivers a single "Future Shade" indicating the expected alignment of a company's activities with the Paris Agreement and feasible sector-specific transition timelines, applicable across all sectors and stages of transition.

Key Features.Description: Gain a qualitative opinion on your company's future alignment with a low-carbon economy, based on planned actions, not just distant targets.
Understand your transition progress with a clear, single "Future Shade" output, based on a recognized and award-winning methodology.
Analyze and demonstrate the credibility of your immediate transition plans and investments, beyond long-term net-zero goals.
Benefit from an assessment applicable to diverse sectors and companies, regardless of their starting point in the climate transition.
Demonstrate your transition credibility to access sustainability-linked or transition financing for both labeled and unlabeled debt.
Utilize the CTA to support applications for green designations on major stock exchanges like Nasdaq, B3, and SIX.
Enhance transparency and credibility in your communications with investors and stakeholders regarding your transition plans.
Obtain a deeper, qualitative opinion on climate transition risk for portfolio companies, aiding investors and financial institutions.

Product Overview.Overview: The CMBX index is a synthetic tradable index designed to reflect the performance of the commercial mortgage-backed securities (CMBS) market.  Referencing a basket of 25 CMBS, it provides investors with a standardized and liquid tool to gauge market sentiment, understand CMBS performance, and implement trading strategies. Its transparent methodology and daily price availability enhance market understanding and accessibility.

Key Features.Description: Benefit from an objective, rules-based approach to index construction and publicly available daily closing prices, ensuring transparency in valuation.
Rely on a standardized selection of reference obligations and contract documentation for consistent and reliable market representation.
Access payment amounts with monthly calculation and posting, providing timely and predictable data.
Track movements in CMBS market sentiment with daily composite levels, enabling real-time market analysis.
Gain understanding of the index's liquidity and transparency using the free PV calculator, supporting informed trading decisions.

Product Overview.Overview: Collateral Manager, powered by CloudMargin, is a leading SaaS solution for modernizing collateral management. Designed for banks, buyside institutions, and outsourcers, it delivers a single, automated platform to control collateral processes, mitigate risk, and reduce operational costs. By leveraging advanced technology, Collateral Manager streamlines workflows for margin calls and collateral management activities, enhancing efficiency and transparency.

Key Features.Description: Streamlines and automates margin call workflows for derivatives and other asset classes, reducing manual intervention and improving efficiency.
Facilitates complex collateral substitution processes, offering flexibility and control in managing collateral portfolios.
Automates interest calculations and reconciliation with counterparties, ensuring accuracy and reducing discrepancies in interest payments.
Provides a complete settlement process and connects to an extensive network of over 70 custodians and major tri-party agents, simplifying and accelerating settlement operations.
Offers a single data structure with real-time reporting and customizable dashboards, providing immediate visibility and insights across the enterprise.
Ensures users are always on the latest version of the platform, eliminating upgrade complexities and providing continuous access to the newest features and improvements.
Enables fully automated straight-through processing (STP) for collateral management, enhancing operational efficiency and scalability to handle increasing volumes.
Allows clients to implement customizable optimization preferences combined with real-time inventory views, maximizing collateral utilization and efficiency.

Product Overview.Overview: Commercial Loan Analytics, offered by Coalition Greenwich, provides powerful insights into the commercial lending market by leveraging a unique and comprehensive dataset. This suite of products is built upon directly submitted loan and fee data from a cohort of participating banks, sourced directly from their loan accounting systems.  Combined with public SBA data, this allows banks to gain a deep understanding of their performance relative to peers, make informed pricing decisions with granular benchmarks, and strategically plan by identifying key market trends, ultimately optimizing portfolio management and strategic direction.

Key Features.Description: Understand your historical performance against industry peers through detailed pricing and portfolio analyses.
Evaluate your commercial loan portfolio allocation and compare it to peer banks to better prepare for economic shifts.
Access detailed pricing benchmarks for both new and renewing loans to optimize pricing decisions.
Shape strategic plans by gaining insights into key market trends and volume movements within commercial lending.
Explore your fixed vs. floating rate exposure and overall term structures in comparison to market benchmarks.
Review recent loan and fee pricing to identify performance gaps and potential opportunities relative to peers.
Analyze expanding and contracting industries to develop targeted penetration strategies tailored to your objectives.
Assess your Commercial Real Estate (CRE) lending exposure across bank-specific metrics and benchmark it against the broader market.

Product Overview.Overview: Commercial Mortgage Evaluator, part of the CDO Suite of Products, provides analytical modeling and data capabilities designed for in-depth commercial mortgage analysis. This tool empowers users to conduct thorough credit, cash flow, and asset-level evaluations, enabling informed decision-making in commercial real estate and related investments.

Key Features.Description: Utilize sophisticated analytical models to evaluate the complexities of commercial mortgages.
Access comprehensive and reliable data to support robust commercial mortgage assessments.
Perform detailed credit analysis to understand the creditworthiness of commercial mortgages.
Analyze cash flow dynamics associated with commercial mortgages for performance insights.
Conduct thorough asset-level analysis to gain granular insights into underlying collateral.
Empower strategic decisions in commercial real estate investments through data-driven evaluations.
Integrates seamlessly within the broader CDO Suite of Products for comprehensive analytical solutions.

Product Overview.Overview: Commercial Prospecting is a powerful solution designed to unlock insights on commercial properties, businesses, and Commercial & Industrial (C&I) loans within the US market, available on the S&P Capital IQ Pro platform. By combining extensive origination and property data with millions of business listings and Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) filings, this tool empowers users to efficiently screen for lending opportunities, streamline due diligence, monitor competition, and gain critical risk intelligence on bank loan portfolios. Whether you aim to grow your loan portfolio, enter new markets, or deepen your understanding of market dynamics, Commercial Prospecting provides the comprehensive data and actionable insights needed for smarter commercial lending and strategic decision-making.

Key Features.Description: Access detailed origination and property data for millions of CRE properties, covering a significant portion of the US market, for comprehensive market analysis.
Explore millions of up-to-date business listings to identify potential borrowers and lending opportunities across various industries.
Leverage UCC filing data across 47 states to generate targeted C&I lead lists and evaluate existing client financial obligations efficiently.
Obtain crucial business details and contact information for key decision-makers, enabling direct outreach and faster deal closures.
Seamlessly link to Vertical IQ for easy-to-comprehend industry intelligence, fostering stronger client relationships and informed lending strategies.
Gain valuable insights into bank loan portfolios to identify potential risks, especially within fluctuating sectors like Commercial Real Estate.
Access detailed information on properties, businesses, and liens, including UCC records, to accelerate and simplify the due diligence process.
Evaluate lending opportunities in new markets and effectively monitor the competitive environment to strategically position your business.

Product Overview.Overview: Commodities at Sea (CAS) is a high-frequency market intelligence service delivering comprehensive visibility into the global waterborne commodity trade. This service provides near real-time data and analytics on commodity supply, trade activities, trade relationships, and fleet movements for commodities transported by tankers and bulkers. CAS offers detailed insights into cargo volumes, voyage specifics, trade flow trends, and fleet metrics, empowering users to understand market dynamics and make informed decisions.

Key Features.Description: Access near real-time data on global commodity trade flows for a wide range of commodities, including crude oil, refined products, and bulk goods.
Analyze trade flows differentiated by commodity type and grade, even while shipments are in transit, providing detailed market insights.
Utilize well-structured data tables and user-friendly interfaces to track trade at various levels of detail, from facility to company, both current and historical.
Monitor real-time vessel movements for both laden and ballast voyages, enhancing supply chain visibility.
Gain valuable analytics on critical fleet metrics such as congestion, fleet employment, wait times, and route optimization.
Benefit from improved destination prediction for both laden and ballast voyages, aiding in better planning and anticipation.
Rely on a conservative, expert-driven methodology ensuring the most reliable and comprehensive dataset on vessel identities, characteristics, and trade details.
Stay informed with regularly published market research notes from experienced industry analysts, providing valuable context and insights.

Product.Product Name: Commodities at Sea: Commodity Movements Dry Bulk

Product Overview.Overview: Gain unparalleled insight into global commodity markets with the Commodities at Sea: Commodity Movements Dry Bulk dataset. Originating from IHS Markit and offered by S&P Commodity Insights, this dataset delivers near real-time transparency into the waterborne flows of major traded dry bulk commodities. Updated twice daily, it provides historical data back to 2016 and granular details on commodity movements at terminal, port, country, and company levels. Covering a broad spectrum of dry bulk commodities and vessel sizes, this dataset empowers traders, analysts, investors, charterers, and fleet operators to make informed decisions and elevate their market analysis in the physical, financial, and freight sectors.

Key Features.Description: Stay ahead of market changes with twice-daily data refreshes, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.
Analyze trends and patterns with historical loadings data dating back to 2016.
Understand global trade dynamics with detailed waterborne commodity flow data at various geographical and organizational levels.
Access data for major bulk, minor bulk, and agri-bulk commodities, providing a holistic market view.
Analyze movements across the entire dry bulk shipping spectrum, from handy size to capesize vessels.
React swiftly to market events with intraday data availability.
Rely on high-quality data originating from IHS Markit and delivered by S&P Commodity Insights.
Empower traders, analysts, investors, and operators to make winning decisions in dynamic markets.

Product Overview.Overview: The Commodities Energy Pricing dataset delivers comprehensive electricity pricing and load data from Independent System Operators (ISOs) across the United States and Canada. This dataset enables users to analyze market trends, optimize power grid operations by assessing demand, and gain insights into market share, competitor pricing, and seasonal patterns for price forecasting.  Furthermore, it facilitates power generation management and environmental impact analysis by correlating power generation and emissions.

Key Features.Description: Access real-time, day-ahead, and locational pricing for over 2,500 instruments, including Locational Margin Pricing (LMPs) and congestion prices, at various granularities from 15-minute to monthly.
Incorporates commodities futures data from the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) alongside proprietary Market Intelligence Power Forecasting (MI Forecast) and Pricing (MI Pricing) data.
Covers 34,000+ nodes across major North American Independent System Operators (ISOs) and Canadian operators, including PJM, SPP, NYISO, ISO-NE, MISO, ERCOT, CAISO, AESO, and IESO.
Analyze market dynamics and identify emerging trends in energy pricing to understand market behavior and anticipate shifts.
Optimize power grid operations by leveraging detailed demand and pricing data to enhance efficiency and resource allocation.
Identify patterns and seasonality within the data to develop robust models for forecasting future price movements and market conditions.
Effectively manage power generation strategies by assessing on-peak and off-peak demand and pricing signals to align supply with demand.
Visualize and analyze the correlation between power generation activities and emissions to support environmental reporting and sustainability initiatives.

Product Overview.Overview: This powerful Excel Add-in provides seamless access to comprehensive commodity market fundamental data directly within Excel. Empowering users to make informed and timely decisions, the tool facilitates in-depth risk assessments and supports enhanced investment strategies.  By offering historical and forward-looking insights, coupled with user-friendly features like consistent formulas, enhanced data download, and customizable templates, it streamlines data retrieval and analysis for commodity market professionals.

Key Features.Description: Access easily accessible content from Commodity Insights to support timely and strategic decision-making.
Perform more in-depth risk assessments utilizing fundamental content from commodity markets.
Gain access to an expanded set of historical and forward-looking fundamental data to refine investment decisions.
Enjoy simple, consistent formulas across all datasets, ensuring a user-friendly and efficient workflow.
Leverage enhanced data download capabilities for rapid access to large volumes of essential data.
Utilize customizable templates to easily access the specific data universe relevant to your unique analysis needs.
Seamlessly integrates as an Excel Add-in, providing a familiar and efficient environment for data analysis.
Compatible with Windows 10 and 11, .NET Framework 4.7.2+, and Excel versions 2013-2019/O365 (32-bit & 64-bit).

Product Overview.Overview: Commodity Insights FTP Delivery provides a secure and efficient solution for accessing market data via sFTP protocol.  Users can conveniently download market data files from the S&P Global Commodity Insights FTP site or establish a direct connection through an sFTP server.  Delivering timestamped snapshots of market data aligned with global market closes and updated at predefined intervals, this service enables automated data retrieval through scheduled scripts, ensuring timely and consistent access to critical market information.

Key Features.Description: Easily set up automated data workflows with consistent data formats and release schedules, streamlining data integration processes.
FTP Delivery offers a straightforward and simple method for accessing predefined market data files.
Data Engineering teams can efficiently build comprehensive data lakes with easy access to historical Platts pricing data.
Data Science teams can leverage extensive historical Platts data to analyze trading patterns and develop automated prediction engines.
Utilizes sFTP protocol for secure login and data transfer, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality.
Access data files via secure login to the S&P Global FTP site or directly connect through an sFTP server for flexible retrieval options.
Data files are updated at predefined times, aligned with global market closes, providing timestamped and consistent market data snapshots.
Users can automate data retrieval using scheduling systems and scripts, enhancing efficiency and reducing manual intervention.

Product Overview.Overview: The Commodity Insights Websocket delivers near real-time commodity data and market insights directly to your systems.  This technology establishes a persistent communication channel, eliminating the need for constant polling and providing immediate access to price assessments, trade data, and refinery outage alerts. It supports integration with internal models, visualization tools, and business intelligence platforms, facilitating real-time analysis and decision-making in commodity markets.

Key Features.Description: Access up-to-the-second commodity data, including price assessments, trade information, and refinery outage alerts, directly pushed to your systems.
Receive data via a persistent connection, removing the need for frequent server polling and reducing latency.
Easily integrate with internal systems, models, and business intelligence tools using standard server-side programming languages and provided software kits.
Access data from Commodity Insights Market Data, Platts eWindow Market Data, and Platts World Refinery Database.
Enable real-time monitoring of portfolio exposure and automated alerts within risk management systems.
Utilize near real-time outage information to proactively adjust logistics and transportation plans.
Expedite integration with readily available software kits in Python, Java, and .NET core.
Leverage data and insights from S&P Commodity Insights, covering oil and gas, power, petrochemicals, metals, agriculture, and shipping.

Product Overview.Overview: ChartIQ's Compact Chart is a streamlined charting solution engineered for maximum performance and minimal footprint. Designed to excel in mobile environments and space-constrained dashboards, it offers essential technical analysis tools within a concise package.  Retaining familiar ChartIQ interactions while introducing innovative features like the Spyglass tool, Compact Chart empowers users with visual analytical capabilities, supports fundamental data display, and adapts to diverse applications from mobile trading platforms to sparkline charts in watchlists, ensuring efficient and informed decision-making.

Key Features.Description: Built for mobile interfaces and touch navigation, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience on mobile devices.
Streamlined charting solution with a low footprint, ideal for dashboards, portals, and applications where screen real estate is limited.
Retains familiar ChartIQ interactions like zooming and panning, allowing for easy and natural chart navigation.
Includes the innovative Spyglass tool, enabling users to gain detailed insights into specific data points on the chart.
Offers popular technical analysis studies such as Moving Averages, MACD, and RSI to facilitate informed trading decisions.
Supports a variety of chart types including Line, Mountain, Candles, and Bars, catering to different visualization preferences.
Features Day and Night themes, along with accessibility options for color blindness, allowing for a personalized user interface.
Written in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS without external dependencies, ensuring compatibility with modern web frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue for straightforward integration.

Product Overview.Overview: The Company Connections: Detailed Estimates (CCDE) dataset provides a unique perspective on company relationships by leveraging sell-side analyst coverage data from S&P Capital IQ Detailed Estimates. This dataset uncovers company-to-company connections based on shared analysts, offering insights into peer groups and enabling the development of sophisticated quantitative signals. By quantifying the strength of relationships through this analyst network, users can gain a deeper understanding of market dynamics and build leading-edge investment strategies.

Key Features.Description: Identify pairwise company connections derived from shared sell-side analysts, revealing hidden links and enhancing your understanding of market ecosystems.
Gain a clearer picture of company peer groups by leveraging analyst-implied relationships, moving beyond traditional industry classifications.
Utilize the pre-calculated Analyst Momentum signal to pinpoint companies whose network is exhibiting strong performance in the recent period.
Explore eight distinct dimensions of the Analyst Momentum signal, broken down by analyst coverage count and recommendation types for nuanced analysis.
Access point-in-time company connections derived from up-to-date analyst coverage, ensuring relevant and timely insights.
Benefit from data spanning over 25,000 companies globally across diverse industries, providing a comprehensive market view.
Leverage historical data initiated in 1998, enabling long-term trend analysis and backtesting of strategies.
Access the dataset through Cloud, Desktop, or Feed delivery channels via platforms like Alpha Signals Web Portal, Snowflake, and Xpressfeed™.

Product Overview.Overview: This product provides access to detailed and analytically adjusted financial data for over 60,000 Indian companies, enabling comprehensive company assessments. It is particularly useful for underwriting and processing workflows, offering in-depth financial insights that facilitate fair comparisons across industries. Beyond standard financials, users gain access to additional data points like auditor details and statutory dues, all delivered through a web-based platform requiring no installation.

Key Features.Description: Access financial data for over 60,000 Indian companies, providing a broad and deep dataset.
Enables fair comparison across industries and sectors with financials that have been analytically adjusted.
Gain access to comprehensive financial details for thorough company assessment and analysis.
Provides supplementary information such as auditor details and statutory dues, enriching your understanding.
Access financials as originally reported, offering a complete picture of company data.
Accessible via the web, eliminating the need for any installation or complex setup.
Facilitates efficient underwriting and processing tasks with readily available financial insights.

Product Overview.Overview: The Company Intelligence dataset delivers comprehensive qualitative insights into companies worldwide.  Access a rich array of data points including historical auditor information, competitor landscapes, alternate company names and addresses, and key documents. Enhance your competitive analysis and gain a deeper understanding of company operations by leveraging this dataset alongside financial data sources.

Key Features.Description: Access both concise summaries and detailed profiles for in-depth company understanding.
Identify all known competitors, including sources, to understand competitive dynamics.
Explore additional company business addresses worldwide, including headquarters locations, for a complete global view.
Review the historical record of financial auditors for informed governance analysis.
Discover alternate and historical company names, ensuring comprehensive identification across different contexts.
Access a complete listing of current and past products and services for market analysis and understanding business lines.
Utilize granular taxonomy to gain deeper insights into a company's operational structure and industry classifications.

Product Overview.Overview: Quantix's Company Profile module, powered by CRISIL, offers a comprehensive view of company-level information in a single platform. This solution aggregates summary financials (annual and quarterly), background details (geographic presence, industry, board of directors, etc.), ratings (history, instrument level for CRISIL rated companies), capital market information, and index of charges.  It empowers users to efficiently conduct preliminary company analysis, monitor creditworthiness with regular updates and customizable alerts, and access analytically adjusted financials for cross-industry comparison and timely ratings data.

Key Features.Description: Access all essential company information in one unified module, eliminating the need to gather data from disparate sources.
Obtain summary financials on an annual and quarterly basis for a quick understanding of a company's financial health.
Explore crucial background information including geographic presence, industry classification, board of directors, and group company linkages.
Review company rating history and instrument-level data specifically for CRISIL rated entities, providing credit risk insights.
Access relevant capital market information to understand a company's market activities and investor perception.
Leverage financials that have been analytically adjusted to facilitate fair and meaningful comparisons across different industries.
Benefit from ratings data that is updated rapidly, with a turnaround time of less than 24 hours, ensuring you have the latest information.
Set up personalized alerts for changes in financials and ratings, enabling proactive credit monitoring and timely responses to critical updates.

Product Overview.Overview: The S&P Company Relationships package is a global database offering a comprehensive view of over 11 million company relationships within the S&P Global universe. This dataset details various relationship types including acquisitions, investments, affiliates, and more, dating back to the year 2000.  Users can leverage this data to construct corporate family trees, identify parent companies and investors, and gain deep insights into corporate structures and networks for strategic decision-making and analysis.

Key Features.Description: Explore a wide array of company relationships, including acquisitions, investments, lending, and affiliations, providing a holistic understanding of corporate ecosystems.
Leverage crucial relationship details like parent-child links, ownership percentages, and investment values to gain granular insights into corporate structures.
Easily build corporate family trees and identify ultimate parent entities, enabling a clear view of organizational hierarchies.
Pinpoint current and historical investors in companies, valuable for due diligence, market research, and competitive analysis.
Access historical company relationship data stretching back to 2000, facilitating trend analysis and long-term perspective.
Analyze company relationships on a worldwide scale, covering diverse industries and geographic regions for comprehensive global insights.
Gain relationship insights across a broad spectrum of industries, including financials, technology, energy, healthcare, and more.
Access data through various channels including API, Cloud, Desktop, and Data Feeds, and platforms like S&P Capital IQ and Snowflake to suit diverse workflows.

Product Overview.Overview: Component Forecast Analytics is a dedicated portal designed for automotive suppliers and OEMs seeking timely, reliable, and comprehensive market intelligence. This platform delivers monthly updated forecasts for over 150 components, empowering users to navigate the complexities of the automotive landscape. By leveraging this data and analysis, businesses can understand the impact of megatrends like electrification and autonomy, gain insights into competitor strategies, assess supplier capabilities, and identify new program opportunities to retain and grow market share in the global auto marketplace.

Key Features.Description: Access the most current market data with forecasts for over 150 components updated every month.
Understand how electrification, autonomy, and connectivity are shaping the future of the automotive component market and impacting revenue generation.
Gain valuable insights into competitors' books of business and component strategies to stay ahead of the curve.
Evaluate supplier plant locations and capacities to inform strategic sourcing decisions.
Pinpoint new program opportunities in the automotive sector within a 6 to 12 year horizon.
Decipher OEM sourcing strategies to better align your business development efforts.
Assess a supplier's market power and identify areas of strength or potential vulnerability.
Recognize and understand competitive pressure points within the component market to optimize your strategies.

Product Overview.Overview: Compustat® Financials, powered by S&P Global and Kensho AI, provides standardized financial statements and market data for over 80,000 global companies, trusted by financial professionals for over 50 years. This comprehensive dataset offers deep historical coverage back to 1950, point-in-time snapshots since 1987, and over 3,000 standardized data items. Designed for investment professionals, academic researchers, and industry analysts, Compustat accelerates insights, simplifies workflows, and enhances performance by delivering robust, consistent data for research, backtesting, and alpha generation across various economic cycles.

Key Features.Description: Access over 3,000 standardized annual, quarterly, year-to-date, and semi-annual financial items covering income statement, balance sheet, cash flow, segment, and ratio data.
Includes data tailored to 12 key industries, providing focused analysis for sector-specific research and benchmarking.
Daily and monthly market data encompassing security pricing, dividends, and splits to support market performance analysis and valuation.
Corporate Tracker provides a detailed history of corporate actions and security identifier changes for accurate historical analysis.
Snapshot data captures changes to fundamental items with associated point dates, enabling precise historical reconstruction and analysis.
Covers over 80,000 active and inactive publicly traded companies globally, offering a broad perspective on the international market landscape.
Historical data extends back to 1950 for North America, providing unparalleled insight across multiple economic cycles and long-term trends.
Leverages S&P Global's data with Kensho's AI expertise to deliver solutions that enhance efficiency, instill confidence, and accelerate discovery in financial analysis.

Product Overview.Overview: Connect, an S&P Global solution, is a robust business and market intelligence platform providing unparalleled access to industry analysis, market research, and economic forecasts from over 2,000 global experts. Designed for capital-intensive industries, this platform features a customizable interface and dynamic analytical tools to empower business decision-makers to effectively monitor investment opportunities, mitigate risks, and stress test strategies. By leveraging S&P Global's extensive intellectual capital, Connect enables users to gain deep insights into markets, understand competitive landscapes, plan for future costs, and manage economic uncertainties, accessible across devices and via API.

Key Features.Description: Gain access to a vast repository of industry analysis, market research, and economic forecasts from over 2,000 world-renowned experts.
Tailor the interface and integrate dynamic analytical tools to match specific workflow needs and preferences.
Utilize features designed to effectively mitigate risks and rigorously stress test business strategies in dynamic market conditions.
Develop a comprehensive understanding of both core and adjacent markets to identify opportunities and navigate competitive landscapes.
Project and plan for future capital and operational development costs with robust forecasting and analytical capabilities.
Consume and analyze content across diverse industries within a unified, analyst-friendly platform view.
Efficiently navigate and filter over 4 million documents by industry, geography, company, topic, date, and content type.
Leverage the power of Connect from any location, at any time, via computer, smartphone, or direct API feed, with 24/7 customer support.

Product Overview.Overview: The S&P Global Connected Car Index is a comprehensive evaluation service designed to help automakers measure and enhance their connected services offerings.  Recognizing the critical importance of connectivity in modern vehicles due to evolving consumer expectations driven by the smartphone ecosystem, this index provides a robust methodology to benchmark OEMs against industry leaders. Through user surveys, digital interface analysis, and expert qualitative assessments, the index delivers actionable insights and recommendations to improve end-to-end connectivity services, ensuring future success in a connected world.

Key Features.Description: Understand how your connected services perform relative to the best in the automotive industry.
Benefit from a holistic assessment encompassing user feedback, in-vehicle/remote interface analysis, and expert qualitative reviews.

Product Overview.Overview: Connecting Issuer Services, originally from IHS Markit and now part of S&P Global Market Intelligence, streamlines and automates the dissemination of corporate actions and company matters announcements. This solution provides a structured interface for issuers to communicate directly with the market, replacing manual, error-prone processes. By utilizing standardized templates, issuers can publish announcements in ISO standard formats and XML, ensuring timely, accurate, and transparent information delivery to market participants like data vendors, custodians, and financial institutions, ultimately benefiting investors through direct and reliable data flow.

Key Features.Description: Issuers utilize structured templates to communicate corporate announcements, ensuring data consistency and accuracy right from the source.
Announcements are immediately available as structured data in industry-standard ISO formats and reliable XML, enhancing interoperability and data consumption.
Facilitates straight-through processing from issuers to investors, eliminating manual interpretation by intermediaries and ensuring transparent information flow.
Structured templates and standard outputs minimize the risks of misinterpretation and inaccuracies associated with manual data extraction.
Faster, more accurate, and consistent information disclosure in standard formats increases operational efficiency for the entire marketplace.
Reduces the time required for critical processes like dividend processing between issuers and exchanges.
By standardizing data at the source, the solution significantly improves the accuracy and reliability of company announcement data.
Standardized data stores create opportunities for developing new revenue streams from market data and access services.

Leveraging deep market intelligence and expert consultation, these solutions are designed to address specific client needs, helping businesses navigate the complexities of the construction market and make informed decisions for optimal growth and efficiency. Contact our team to discover the perfect plan for your unique requirements and unlock the power of customized construction intelligence.

Key Features.Description: Receive customized construction strategies specifically designed to meet your unique business objectives and challenges.
