Access and review publicly available index rules, enhancing transparency and allowing for thorough understanding of the index construction and maintenance.
Stay informed with transparent publication of rebalance events, ensuring predictability and clarity in index adjustments.
Easily access and disseminate index values to all major data vendors, facilitating wide market reach and data accessibility.
Ensure adherence to benchmark regulations with a service designed to meet and exceed industry standards.
Leverage a full range of services supporting benchmark compliance for index design, calculation, maintenance, and the utilization of benchmark data.

Product Overview.Overview: A single source solution for the aggregation, validation, and distribution of multi-asset class indices and ETFs.  Sourced from a global network of equity and fixed income index providers, exchanges, ETF issuers, and custodians, this managed service standardizes complex index and ETF data management requirements. Customizable solutions are available for both buy-side and sell-side firms.

Key Features.Description: Provides a normalized and enriched feed of ETF and index composition and rebalance data, distributed ahead of market open for trading, hedging, and investment activities across global markets.
Offers comprehensive reference information for every fund and security listed globally across all asset classes, including crucial corporate action and dividend data.
Delivers an independent calculation of the intraday Net Asset Value (iNAV) for ETFs, leveraging industry-leading real-time trade data and proprietary valuation models across various asset classes.
Includes a look-through service into the composition data of indices, ETPs, and mutual funds to effectively address multiple regulatory, governmental, or elective exclusion criteria.
Leverages established relationships with over 250 global data providers to ensure broad and deep market coverage.
Utilizes a partnership with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to provide multi-region availability and robust operational resilience.
Streamlines operations and significantly reduces the total cost of ownership by providing a comprehensive, all-in-one solution.
Offers dedicated specialist support teams available around the clock, five days a week, ensuring continuous assistance and expertise.

Product Overview.Overview: Access premium index benchmarking data from major providers like Euronext, FTSE, Russell, MSCI, and TOPIX Japan, fully integrated within the S&P Global Market Intelligence ecosystem. This dataset is designed for investors who need to track and simulate index performance or benchmark against global and US equity markets. It includes index returns, constituent data, and key index metrics, enabling users to focus on their investment strategies with comprehensive and reliable index information.

Key Features.Description: Access data from leading index providers covering key sectors of the US and global equity markets.
Track and simulate index performance with daily price and total return series.
Analyze index composition with constituent weights, identifiers, and corporate action data when available.
Leverage extensive history dating back to 1928, with significant coverage from 1989 for long-term analysis.
Benefit from data linked to S&P Global entity identifiers for easy integration within the broader S&P Global ecosystem.
Receive data through various channels including API, Cloud, Desktop, and Feed to suit your workflow.
Stay current with intraday reporting frequency and dataset latency for timely market insights.
Explore a wide range of data points with hundreds of fields available within the dataset.

Product Overview.Overview: Index Management Data from IHS Markit offers actionable intelligence essential for daily trading and valuation by converting theoretical financial indices into practical, tradeable baskets. This dataset empowers users to model investment strategies against published market indices through a consistent calculation methodology ensuring transparent baskets and reconcilable index performance. It provides access to validated index data in a standardized format, encompassing daily composition, forward index membership, corporate actions, dividends, and security master data, streamlining data access and ensuring format consistency across numerous providers.

Key Features.Description: Access daily composition data, T+ index changes, corporate actions, dividends, and essential reference data for timely insights.
Significantly reduces the time and technological resources required to onboard and manage new index datasets.
Includes index data from over 120 diverse providers, exchanges, banks, and investment managers worldwide.
Supports analysis and research with over 100,000 indices and 600,000+ currency/return variants.
Provides validated index data in a single, robust, and structured format, ensuring consistency and ease of use.
Offers transparent baskets with reconcilable index performance due to a consistent calculation methodology.
Further enhanced with security master data, adding depth and context to index information.
Provides data with global geographic coverage, supporting international investment strategies.

Product Overview.Overview: The India Credit Ratings dataset by CRISIL provides comprehensive credit rating information for over 20,000 Indian companies at an instrument level. This dataset delivers both current and historical rating details, enabling users to monitor rating movements and understand company creditworthiness over time. It includes analyst observations on company strengths and weaknesses, and can be configured to incorporate detailed rating reports, as well as information on banks with rated exposures, making it a valuable resource for in-depth credit risk analysis and monitoring.

Key Features.Description: Access up-to-date credit ratings for over 20,000 Indian companies to understand their current credit standing.
Analyze historical rating changes and trends to gain insights into company credit trajectory and rating movements.
Obtain detailed rating reports (upon configuration) for deeper analysis and comprehensive understanding of credit assessments.
Leverage analyst insights on company strengths and weaknesses to understand the rationale behind ratings.
Identify banks with rated exposures to companies, providing a view of inter-institutional credit relationships.
Explore a broad dataset encompassing 20,000+ Indian companies across diverse sectors.
Access data history initiated from 2006, with significant coverage from 2008, for long-term trend analysis.
Stay informed with daily data updates ensuring access to the most recent rating information.

Product Overview.Overview: The Industry Sector Cross Reference Service (ISCRS) dataset, provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence, is designed to streamline industry classification analysis. It links multiple industry classification systems, including GICS, NAICS, and NACE, at the company level, providing a comprehensive view for regulatory compliance, granular company comparisons, and efficient data linking. Leveraging regionally recognized classifications applied globally and standardized to the S&P Global Market Intelligence company ID, ISCRS offers extensive coverage of over 12 million companies worldwide across diverse industries, dating back to 2014, and is delivered through various channels like API and Cloud platforms.

Key Features.Description: Access multiple industry classification systems like GICS, NAICS, NACE, and more, all within a single dataset.
Connect industry classifications at the company level for over 12 million companies worldwide.
Utilize regionally recognized classification systems to meet diverse regulatory requirements.
Leverage multiple levels of industry sector taxonomies for detailed company comparison and screening.
Simplify data integration using region-specific classifications applied on a global and standardized scale.
Benefit from industry classifications linked to the S&P Global Market Intelligence company ID for consistency.
Access data dating back to 2014 for historical trend analysis and research.
Receive data via API, Cloud, or Feed platforms to suit various integration needs.

Product Overview.Overview: Initial Margin, from S&P Global Market Intelligence, is a comprehensive calculation service for OTC derivatives, seamlessly integrated within our Portfolio Valuations service. Designed to assist with regulatory compliance and streamline collateral processes, Initial Margin delivers accurate risk sensitivities and initial margin calculations using industry-standard models like ISDA SIMMTM and schedule-based approaches.  The service also offers backtesting and benchmarking capabilities for model governance and threshold monitoring to effectively track initial margin exposures, evolving into a complete solution as regulatory thresholds progress.

Key Features.Description: Leverage ISDA SIMMTM and schedule-based models for precise and reliable initial margin calculations, ensuring regulatory compliance.
Benefit from backtesting and benchmarking against industry risk models to fulfill Model Governance requirements and maintain robust model validation.
Proactively track initial margin exposures with flexible monitoring, allowing for seamless adaptation as thresholds evolve and ensuring continuous compliance.
Utilize a single, unified source for both initial and variation margin calculations, ensuring data consistency and simplifying NAV and collateral exposure management.
Rely on calculations based on S&P Global Market Intelligence's high-quality market data and industry-leading valuations and risk sensitivities for superior accuracy.
Experience peace of mind with a service backed by over 15 years of proven global client support from S&P Global Market Intelligence experts.
Accommodate various input formats such as Excel and XLM, and receive output in standard formats like ISDA CRIF and IM files for seamless workflow integration.
Access a fully hosted calculation service, eliminating installation complexities and ensuring immediate access and ease of use.

Product Overview.Overview: The Initial Margin Calculation Workflow solution is designed to help financial institutions navigate the complexities of initial margin requirements for uncleared derivatives under BCBS/IOSCO guidelines. It provides accurate and fast trade calculations using industry-standard models like ISDA SIMM and Schedule-based approaches, enabling firms to efficiently assess trade impacts, calculate initial margin, and manage the margin exchange workflow. The service also includes backtesting and benchmarking capabilities for model governance and initial margin monitoring to track exposures effectively.

Key Features.Description: Leverages ISDA SIMM and Schedule-based models to deliver precise and reliable initial margin calculations, ensuring compliance and minimizing risk.
Enables rapid evaluation of proposed trades, allowing for quick decision-making and efficient portfolio management by understanding margin implications upfront.
Streamlines and automates the margin exchange workflow, reducing manual processes and improving operational efficiency in collateral management.
Offers flexibility by supporting both the industry-standard ISDA SIMM methodology and simpler Schedule-based models to accommodate various client needs and portfolio complexities.
Includes backtesting and benchmarking functionalities against industry risk models, facilitating thorough model validation and meeting stringent regulatory model governance requirements.
Provides continuous and flexible monitoring of initial margin exposures, offering an accurate view of risk and enabling proactive management of margin thresholds.
Helps firms confidently address complex variation and initial margin requirements, ensuring adherence to BCBS/IOSCO guidelines and navigating the evolving regulatory landscape.
Increases efficiency across the enterprise by automating and optimizing margin processes, freeing up resources and reducing operational costs associated with margin management.

Product Overview.Overview: Platts Inside NRC is a bi-weekly publication delivering critical news and insights on nuclear power regulation, with a specialized focus on the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission. Industry professionals worldwide rely on its timely, accurate, and objective reporting from veteran journalists to stay informed about global regulatory developments.  It provides essential intelligence to understand the impact of regulatory actions on operations, plant financial health, upgrade approvals, and strategic decision-making in the nuclear power sector.

Key Features.Description: Stay informed on the activities of nuclear regulatory bodies in the US, Europe, and Asia.
Receive early warnings about planned regulatory actions that could impact nuclear plant operations and grid stability.
Understand plant financial health through insights into NRC inspection levels.
Access timely coverage of NRC approvals for crucial nuclear unit upgrades.
Make informed decisions based on reliable, objective reporting and expert analysis.
Save valuable time with a single publication consolidating the most relevant regulatory information.
Gain exclusive insights into global regulatory issues, proposals, and emerging technical challenges.
Monitor changes in regulatory personnel and understand the perspectives of top regulators and policy influencers.

Product Overview.Overview: The Institutional Ownership Factors dataset from S&P Global Market Intelligence offers daily insights into the equity investment trends of institutions worldwide. Leveraging a proprietary point-in-time Ownership dataset, it provides granular information on global institutional and fund-owned security positions, fund flows, and market activity across both developed and emerging markets.  By combining quantitative research with raw ownership data sourced from various filings and reports, this dataset delivers equity-level signals that are key drivers of stock price performance, offering users a comprehensive understanding of institutional capital flows in global equities.

Key Features.Description: Gain daily, granular insights into global institutional and fund ownership trends.
Understand capital flows and institutional activity across developed and emerging markets.
Leverages S&P Global Market Intelligence's point-in-time Ownership dataset for accuracy and depth.
Access quantitative, equity-level signals derived from institutional ownership data, designed to identify drivers of stock price performance.
Analyze ownership concentration and market crowding in global equity markets.
Monitor hedge fund ownership and broader institutional holding activity for informed investment strategies.
Track trends in institutional buying and selling to anticipate market movements.
Assess changes in holdings and liquidity flow ratios to understand market dynamics.

Product Overview.Overview: Insurer Financial Strength Ratings are forward-looking opinions on an insurance organization's capacity to meet its policyholder and contractual obligations. These ratings are valuable tools for a wide range of stakeholders in the insurance industry, including insurance buyers, risk managers, employee benefit administrators, and insurance brokers and agents. They serve to inform and support decision-making related to insurer financial security and can be leveraged for due diligence, risk assessment, and strategic communications.

Key Features.Description: Clearly communicate your company's financial strength to key stakeholders such as counterparties, investors, policyholders, brokers, and risk managers, fostering trust and confidence.
Gain a competitive advantage in attracting and retaining business, particularly from credit-sensitive brokers, agents, and insurance buyers who prioritize financial stability.
Potentially reduce financing expenses from lenders and other counterparties by demonstrating financial strength and reducing perceived risk.
Facilitate entry into new markets where a strong financial strength rating is advantageous for differentiation or mandated by regulatory requirements.
Assist insurance brokers and agents in meeting their due diligence and disclosure obligations by providing a credible and independent assessment of insurer financial health.
Enable risk managers and employee benefit administrators to make informed decisions about insurer selection and counterparty risk assessment based on objective financial strength evaluations.
Stand out from competitors by leveraging a recognized Insurer Financial Strength Rating to highlight your organization's commitment to financial stability and reliability.
Support compliance with regulatory frameworks that encourage or require financial strength ratings for insurance organizations in specific markets.

Product Overview.Overview: The Insurer Risk-Based Capital (RBC) model is a sophisticated tool used globally to analyze the capital adequacy of insurers and reinsurers. It determines the amount of capital an insurer needs, beyond its reserves, to absorb potential losses from a range of market, credit, and insurance risks under four distinct stress scenarios. By comparing an insurer's total adjusted capital (TAC) against the calculated capital requirements, the model provides a foundational assessment of capital and earnings. This output is a key component, alongside qualitative factors, in determining an insurer's overall credit rating according to the "Insurer Risk-Based Capital Adequacy -- Methodology And Assumptions" criteria.

Key Features.Description: Assesses the capital required to cover losses from diverse risks, including market, credit, pricing, and reserving.
Evaluates capital adequacy under four distinct stress scenarios to test an insurer's resilience and financial stability.
Determines the Total Adjusted Capital (TAC), providing a complete view of the capital available to absorb losses from both on- and off-balance-sheet items.
Delivers a crucial quantitative output that serves as the starting point for assessing an insurer's capital and earnings, a key factor in the ratings process.
Utilizes risk factors calibrated with up to 30 years of historical data, supplemented by scenario analysis, for robust and relevant results.
Incorporates correlation matrices to recognize the benefits of risk diversification, preventing an overestimation of total capital required.
Directly implements the established assumptions and methodology detailed in the "Insurer Risk-Based Capital Adequacy" criteria, ensuring clarity and consistency.
Accepts a wide range of inputs, including various asset classes, insurance premiums, reserves, and other exposures like natural catastrophe risk.

Product Overview.Overview: Intapp Conflicts, leveraging S&P Global Market Intelligence data, is a solution designed for professional service firms to efficiently manage and mitigate conflicts of interest.  This native integration streamlines the process of evaluating new business and onboarding clients by automating workflows for identifying corporate conflicts and providing real-time notifications of changes. It empowers firms to reduce the risk of taking on conflicting business, improve data quality, and enhance overall business process efficiency.

Key Features.Description: Utilize corporate structure data to identify potential conflicts of interest before client onboarding, ensuring informed decisions.
Simplify corporate linkage research and accelerate the conflicts-clearing process for faster onboarding of new business.
Continuously monitor clients, corporate structures, and stakeholders in real-time to minimize risk with up-to-date information.
Cleanse and match existing accounts, establishing a single source of truth for improved data accuracy and consistency.
Enrich accounts, contacts, and leads within Intapp CRM with comprehensive ownership, financial, and corporate structure data.
Native integration eliminates disconnected searches and custom coding, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted workflow within Intapp Conflicts.
Configure Intapp OnePlace with data mapped to your firm's specific taxonomy and workflows for a tailored solution.
Easily implement the solution as cloud-hosted or on-premises, with straightforward activation of your S&P Global Market Intelligence data subscription.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Sustainability Insights provides essential intelligence to navigate the evolving landscape of ESG and sustainability.  Leveraging the foundation of the S&P Global Corporate Sustainability Assessment, their solutions offer multiple layers of data and analytics, going beyond traditional financial metrics.  Gain access to comprehensive ESG Scores, granular sustainability data, and portfolio analytics to inform strategies, manage risks, and stay ahead of emerging sustainability trends, ultimately empowering you to build a more sustainable future.

Key Features.Description: Gain multi-layered sustainability intelligence with Environmental, Social, and Governance scores, informed by industry-specific criteria from the S&P Global CSA.
Access up to 1,000 data points per company, covering 10,000 companies representing approximately 99% of global market capitalization.
Optimize portfolio sustainability performance and meet reporting standards with high-quality data insights on portfolio sustainability.
Dive deep into sustainability risks and opportunities with access to detailed data feeds tailored to your specific workflows.
Identify and understand emerging and underreported sustainability trends to get ahead of the curve in this dynamic field.
Inform differentiated sustainability strategies built on comprehensive data sources and a sharp focus on material sustainability issues.
Remain informed on the latest sustainability and climate developments to effectively manage risks and seize opportunities.
Chart your path towards a sustainable future with a trusted partner in essential sustainability intelligence and workflow solutions.

Product Overview.Overview: The International Exploration & Production (E&P) Content Center, also known as EDIN, is a web-based solution from S&P Commodity Insights providing geologists, reservoir engineers, and business analysts with unparalleled access to current E&P, Basin, and Midstream data. This AI-powered platform enables users to comprehensively analyze industry trends, evaluate investment opportunities across different scales, mitigate subsurface risks, monitor competitor actions, benchmark reservoir performance, optimize investment strategies, and effectively navigate the energy transition, all through a powerful search engine and intuitive visualization tools.

Key Features.Description: Quickly and easily explore the most comprehensive global E&P database with an intelligent search engine that is continually improving.
Access the world's most extensive collection of E&P, Basin, and Midstream content, originating from IHS Markit.
Visualize geographic trends, incorporate third-party map layers, and create custom maps for presentations and reports.
Explore, understand, and explain trends or anomalies through intuitive visualizations built on Spotfire technology.
Analyze industry trends and track competitor activity to inform strategic decisions.
Screen and assess investment opportunities at any scale, from basin to reservoir.
Identify and mitigate against subsurface risks with access to comprehensive data and analytical tools.
Evaluate and benchmark reservoir performance to optimize production and investment strategies.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global's Investor Onboarding Solution revolutionizes the client onboarding process by addressing operational and regulatory hurdles. This comprehensive solution streamlines operations, enhances client experience, and simplifies the complexities of investor onboarding for both investors and fund managers, ensuring efficiency and compliance throughout the entire process.

Key Features.Description: Deploy a single, user-friendly digital onboarding experience for investors to easily subscribe to funds. Features include a central platform, online data input, electronic signatures, and real-time document uploads, significantly improving onboarding efficiency.

Ensure adherence to global regulatory obligations, including U.S. Tax, OECD CRS, and KYC, through customizable workflows. The solution digitizes document collection and validation, addressing AML/KYC requirements and ongoing compliance needs.

Integrate effortlessly with existing systems and applications like CRM and Tax Solutions via API. The platform offers a configurable, white-labeled investor portal and centralizes investor data and documentation, reducing manual paperwork and enhancing data management.

Benefit from S&P Global's KYC Managed Services team for expert assistance in validating and monitoring KYC documentation. This support reduces operational challenges, ensures regulatory compliance, and allows you to focus on core business activities while delivering a seamless client experience.

Product Overview.Overview: IPqwery Patent & Trademark Data offers a comprehensive dataset for understanding the intellectual property landscape of both public and private companies globally. Powered by IP data experts, this dataset provides patent and trademark records, enabling users to track company filings, analyze industry trends, and assess IP involvement in mergers and acquisitions. With weekly updates and historical data, it facilitates advanced analytics and provides valuable insights into the IP activities of over 400,000 companies across diverse industries.

Key Features.Description: Access patent and trademark records for a holistic view of intellectual property.
Includes data for both public and private companies, capturing IP activity across the business spectrum.
Stay current with the latest IP filings and ownership changes through timely weekly data delivery.
Analyze trends and changes over time with historical IP records and ownership history.
Enhance data interpretation and comparison with specialized IP metrics.
Explore IP activity across multiple jurisdictions and international IP offices.
Leverage an evolving AI search engine for efficient data discovery and analysis.
Utilize user guides, data schemas, and API documentation for seamless integration and data utilization.

Product Overview.Overview: The International Sustainability Standards Board (ISSB) is creating a globally recognized language for sustainability-related disclosures, aiming to meet the information needs of investors and enable companies to provide comprehensive sustainability information to capital markets worldwide. S&P Global offers solutions to help companies navigate ISSB reporting, leveraging their heritage and expertise to assist with gap assessments, GHG emissions reporting, science-based target setting, and climate risk quantification, ensuring alignment with evolving global standards and frameworks like TCFD and the Greenhouse Gas Protocol.

Key Features.Description: Measure and understand your carbon footprint across your entire value chain, including operations, supply chains, and downstream product use.
Develop robust, science-aligned targets to demonstrate your commitment to climate action and strengthen your sustainability strategy.

Pinpoint and quantify your assets' exposure to a range of physical climate hazards, including water stress, flooding, and extreme weather events, under various climate scenarios and estimate potential financial losses.
Evaluate your exposure to financial risks arising from the transition to a low-carbon economy, considering carbon pricing policies, market shifts, and impacts on operating costs and margins.
Quantify the potential financial impacts of climate-related risks across different future scenarios and time horizons, enabling informed strategic planning and risk management.
Key Features.Feature: Scenario Risk Analysis for Financial Impact

Key Features.Description: Identify gaps in your current climate disclosures against the IFRS S2 standards and benchmark against industry peers to understand your alignment and areas for improvement.
Key Features.Feature: IFRS S2 Climate Disclosure Gap Assessment

Key Features.Description: Leverage S&P Global's deep heritage and analytical approach, drawing on industry-leading frameworks like TCFD, GHG Protocol, and SBTi for robust and reliable ISSB reporting.
Connect sustainability data with financial data and market intelligence through flexible delivery options, enhancing productivity and providing comprehensive insights for informed decision-making.

Product Overview.Overview: iTraxx indices are a family of credit default swap indices covering European, Asian, and emerging markets, designed for trading and portfolio management. These rules-based indices comprise the most liquid entities in their respective regions, ensuring replicability and market representation. iTraxx allows investors to express credit sentiments and manage exposures by providing benchmarks for investment-grade and sub-investment grade credit in various maturities and regions, including Europe, Asia-Pacific, and CEEMEA.

Key Features.Description: Facilitate quick, large-size trades with electronic confirmation for streamlined execution.
Leverage extensive dealer and industry support, ensuring significant liquidity across diverse market conditions.
Rely on daily pricing availability and standardized, documented index characteristics for clear valuation.
Benefit from contributed prices from leading banks and rigorous quality controls, ensuring reliable data.
Access indices covering European, Asian, and Emerging Markets, providing broad geographical exposure.
Utilize benchmark indices like iTraxx Europe and iTraxx Asia ex-Japan for performance measurement and market tracking.
Actively manage credit exposures and express bullish or bearish sentiments on credit as an asset class.
Choose from a suite of indices including investment-grade, crossover, and regional specific indices like iTraxx Australia and iTraxx CEEMEA.

Product Overview.Overview: Kensho Extract is a powerful solution designed to convert static PDF documents into machine-readable formats, unlocking valuable data and insights. It enables full-text search capabilities within PDF repositories, empowers sophisticated Natural Language Processing (NLP) workflows, and facilitates the extraction of tabular data at scale.  Specifically optimized for business and financial documents and leveraging proprietary S&P Global training data, Kensho Extract offers superior accuracy and performance, processing documents 10x faster than other vendors, making it ideal for high-volume document processing needs.

Key Features.Description: Convert static PDFs into searchable documents, enabling efficient information retrieval across your document archives.
Transform inaccessible PDFs into machine-readable formats, feeding advanced NLP solutions for key-value pair extraction, named entity recognition, and topic modeling.
Automatically identify and export tables from PDFs into user-friendly formats like JSON, Excel, and CSV for data analysis and integration.
Leverage a machine learning model that adapts to a broad range of table types, unlike rigid rule-based systems, ensuring robust table data capture.
Outperform general-purpose extraction tools on complex financial documents, delivering superior results in the business and finance domain.
Benefit from models trained on S&P Global's extensive financial document repository, ensuring expertise and precision in financial data extraction.
Process documents at speeds 10x faster than other vendors, enabling rapid turnaround and scalability for large document volumes.
Receive extracted data in CSV and JSON formats, facilitating seamless integration with various systems and workflows.

Product Overview.Overview: Kensho Link is an innovative AI-powered solution from S&P Global that streamlines company data mapping and entity recognition. Leveraging advanced machine learning, Kensho Link accurately and rapidly maps messy company data to S&P Global company IDs and global identifiers. This solution significantly reduces the time and effort required to connect to the comprehensive S&P Global data universe, enabling users to quickly enrich their data, gain valuable insights, and maintain up-to-date company databases.

Key Features.Description: Employs advanced Machine Learning (ML) models to ensure highly accurate company mapping by considering both input data and the vast S&P Global company databases.
Effortlessly connects your company data to S&P Global identifiers, facilitating access to a wealth of enriched information and insights.
Processes large volumes of data with speed, handling files up to 100 MB containing millions of entities, suitable for both batch and real-time processing needs.
Offers both a user-friendly Browser-Based File Uploader for drag-and-drop convenience and a REST API for seamless integration into automated workflows.
Provides quick turnaround times, processing single entity requests via API in under a second and larger file uploads within a few hours.
Returns top company matches with quality scores and optional basic company foundation data, including legal name, address, and contact information.
Accepts various data inputs such as company names, addresses, aliases, and more, enhancing accuracy with additional provided information.
Automates the complex process of company data mapping, significantly reducing manual work and freeing up resources for more strategic tasks.

Product Overview.Overview: Kensho LLM-ready API, developed by Kensho (the AI accelerator for S&P Global), is designed to empower professionals in finance and data analysis. This API seamlessly integrates with leading large language models like GPT, Gemini, and Claude, allowing users to leverage natural language queries to access S&P Global's extensive tabular datasets.  Optimized for LLM workflows with a simplified structure and a dedicated Python library, it streamlines data retrieval for financial statements, market data, and company information, enabling faster insights and improved efficiency for tasks such as research reports and financial analysis.

Key Features.Description: Simplified structure and Python library designed for seamless integration with large language models like GPT, Gemini, and Claude.
Enables users to query S&P Global tabular datasets using natural language, eliminating the need for complex coding.
Provides quick and reliable access to company financials, market data, and global securities data from S&P Global.
Reduces time spent on data integration and preprocessing, saving valuable resources.
Boosts the capabilities and value of Generative AI applications in the financial domain.
Can be used with LLMs or as a standalone Python SDK for various data access needs.
Facilitates tasks like financial analysis, valuation modeling, and research report generation.
Specifically tailored for investment bankers, equity analysts, consultants, and data-driven roles.

Product Overview.Overview: Kensho NERD (Named Entity Recognition and Disambiguation) is a cutting-edge machine learning system developed by Kensho, the AI accelerator of S&P Global, to unlock the potential of textual data.  Specifically optimized for financial documents and now enhanced with S&P Global's Professionals dataset, NERD identifies and links entities like companies, people, and organizations within text to rich knowledge bases such as S&P Capital IQ and Wikimedia. This powerful tool enables users to uncover hidden connections, enhance search capabilities, and gain deeper insights from unstructured text, ultimately supercharging research and analysis workflows.

Key Features.Description: Leverages S&P Global's Professionals dataset to identify people in text and provide their Professional IDs, offering a richer understanding of individuals mentioned.
Trained on millions of business documents, NERD is uniquely optimized to extract financial entity information, ensuring high accuracy in the financial domain.
Seamlessly links identified entities to S&P Global's Capital IQ database, enriching your textual data with comprehensive financial information and enabling deeper analysis.
Utilizes a Wikimedia engine to connect entities to a vast knowledge base, uncovering people, places, products, and events beyond the financial realm.
Effectively resolves ambiguous entity mentions, including abbreviations, acronyms, and aliases, ensuring accurate entity linking and reducing noise.
Combines advanced entity recognition techniques with context-aware linking to extract entity information precisely and effectively from diverse textual sources.
Offers a straightforward REST API for easy integration into existing systems and workflows, facilitating seamless data processing.
Provides output in JSON format, enabling efficient data consumption and integration with various applications and analytical tools.

Product Overview.Overview: Kensho Scribe is a leading on-demand transcription service specifically engineered for the complexities of financial audio. Leveraging sophisticated deep learning models and trained on over 100,000 hours of domain-specific financial content from S&P Global, Scribe accurately transcribes audio into text, handling industry jargon, numbers, and nuances of spoken language. Offered in two complementary versions, Scribe AI for rapid, high-accuracy transcription and Scribe Human-in-the-Loop for near-perfect 99%+ accuracy through human review, Scribe delivers unparalleled performance and speed, processing each minute of audio in under a second.

Key Features.Description: Purpose-built and trained on extensive financial audio data, ensuring superior accuracy for finance-specific terminology and contexts.
Achieves significantly higher accuracy on financial audio compared to general transcription services and even those tailored to finance, minimizing errors.
Transcribes audio at exceptional speed, processing each minute in less than a second, enabling quick access to transcriptions.
Supports both uploading audio files for transcription and streaming audio for live, real-time transcription capabilities.
Offers a premium service with human review for achieving near-perfect 99%+ accuracy, ideal for critical and sensitive content.
Significantly reduces transcription delivery time, as demonstrated by S&P Global's internal use case, saving valuable time.
Accepts common audio formats like MP3 and WAV and provides output in JSON format, ensuring compatibility and ease of integration.
Accessible via REST API, allowing seamless integration into existing workflows and systems for automated transcription processes.

Product Overview.Overview: The Key Developments dataset delivers structured, point-in-time summaries of critical news and events impacting security market values, with history extending back to 2003.  This intraday dataset captures over 2,000 key developments daily, sourced from 20,000+ news outlets, and encompasses a broad spectrum of event types including dividends, M&A, regulatory changes, and more. Designed to empower trading models, research, risk management, compliance, and trade surveillance, it provides comprehensive global coverage of both public and private companies across diverse asset classes and trading strategies.

Key Features.Description: Monitors 2,000+ key developments daily, ensuring comprehensive tracking of market-moving events for a complete market overview.
Provides intraday delivery and point-in-time data, crucial for timely analysis, intraday trading strategies, and historical perspective.
Captures diverse events including dividends, M&A, buybacks, public offerings, management changes, and regulatory inquiries, offering a holistic view of market dynamics.
Collects data from over 20,000 news sources globally, enhancing data depth, reliability, and reducing bias.
Offers worldwide coverage of both public and private companies, providing a broad and inclusive market perspective.
Maintains history back to 2003, enabling long-term trend analysis, backtesting, and historical research.
Facilitates trading model development, in-depth research, robust risk management, regulatory compliance, and effective trade surveillance.
Available through API, Cloud, Desktop, and Feed, ensuring seamless integration with various systems and platforms.

Product Overview.Overview: The Key Documents dataset from S&P Global Market Intelligence provides comprehensive data and insights extracted from corporate agreements and filings. This dataset enables users to identify both opportunities and potential risks within corporate and merger & acquisition agreements. By leveraging this data, users can uncover critical issues such as aggressive accounting practices, excessive compensation, and questionable self-dealing, gaining a broader company-wide perspective through insights into significant trends within filings. Key document categories covered include security holders' rights, corporate agreements, M&A agreements, key contracts, and employment agreements.

Key Features.Description: Pinpoint potential opportunities and challenges within corporate and merger & acquisition agreements.
Detect aggressive accounting, excessive compensation, and questionable self-dealing within companies.
Understand broader trends in corporate filings for a holistic view.
Explore key document categories including corporate, M&A, employment, and more.
Access data with global geographic coverage.
Covers a wide range of industries including Financials, Energy, Healthcare, and more.
Data history initiated in 1994, with significant coverage from 1997.
Receive data updates with near real-time reporting frequency.

Product Overview.Overview: Kingdom Geophysics is a comprehensive software solution designed for geoscientists to interpret and analyze seismic data with pinpoint accuracy, enhancing subsurface understanding from prospect to production.  Developed by S&P Global Commodity Insights, this widely trusted tool streamlines workflows for both basic and advanced geophysical interpretation, supporting 2D/3D seismic data, pre-stack gathers, and microseismic analysis.  Kingdom enables users to predict geological features like faults and fractures, model reservoir properties, and perform sophisticated analyses such as synthetic modeling, velocity modeling, and AVO analysis, ultimately leading to improved interpretation quality and more informed decision-making in oil and gas exploration and development.

Key Features.Description: Predict faults and fractures with pinpoint accuracy, ensuring high-quality interpretations of subsurface structures from seismic data.
Experience faster interpretation and data analysis through streamlined functionality from prospect to production, enhancing efficiency in geophysical workflows.
Visualize and interpret 2D and 3D seismic data, condition pre-stack gathers, analyze microseismic data, and model reservoir properties with a comprehensive toolkit.
Unlock hidden information by generating and visualizing over 50 seismic attributes in 3D space, powered by advanced processing technologies for in-depth subsurface characterization.

Perform synthetic modeling (1D & 2D), high-definition velocity modeling with uncertainty estimation, and dynamic depth conversion, all within an integrated environment for consistent subsurface models.
Enable maximum collaboration with multi-user and multi-author capabilities and a scalable database, suitable for both large regional studies and detailed prospect analyses.
Utilize an easy-to-use, Windows-based tool that combines all capabilities needed for basin-wide exploration and advanced field evaluation, ensuring user-friendly operation.
Manage and format 2D SEGY files, share data with Petrel and other applications via OpenSpirit links, and handle multi-project environments, ensuring data accessibility and workflow integration.

Product Overview.Overview: Know Your Customer (KYC) Services provides a comprehensive, end-to-end solution for managing the entire KYC lifecycle, specifically designed for financial institutions navigating complex regulatory requirements.  Leveraging advanced technology, extensive data resources, and a team of managed services professionals, this solution streamlines critical KYC processes.  From efficient client onboarding and data remediation to periodic refreshes, screening, and counterparty communication, KYC Services offers a secure, unified online platform to enhance operational efficiency and ensure regulatory compliance.

Key Features.Description: Manage the complete KYC lifecycle, from initial onboarding to ongoing monitoring and data maintenance, all within a single integrated platform.
Utilize market-leading technology for automated data extraction, matching, and updates, significantly reducing manual effort and improving accuracy.
Gain access to over 60,000 validated KYC profiles, 250,000+ fund profiles, proprietary datasets, and third-party data relationships for in-depth entity due diligence.
Leverage a team of over 500 managed service professionals for dedicated KYC operational support, client outreach, screening alert resolution, and project management.
Ensure adherence to KYC regulations with a solution designed to meet the evolving demands of financial compliance.
Cleanse and maintain high-quality entity data through automated matching, batch updates, and periodic refresh capabilities, establishing a single source of truth.
Operate within a secure, web-based platform, ensuring data protection and accessibility for authorized users.
Integrate KYC data seamlessly with existing systems via API inputs and outputs, supporting both API and PDF formats for data delivery.

Product Overview.Overview: Know Your Third Party (KY3P) is a comprehensive suite of integrated solutions designed to effectively manage end-to-end third-party and vendor risk. In an environment of increasing regulatory scrutiny and sophisticated cyber threats targeting third-party relationships, KY3P offers industry-driven solutions to streamline due diligence, enhance transparency, and drive efficiency in vendor risk management programs. It provides tools for standardized onboarding, continuous monitoring, and shared assessments, empowering organizations to build robust policies, understand inherent risks, and maintain ongoing oversight of their critical vendor relationships.

Key Features.Description: Streamline the entire vendor lifecycle from onboarding to offboarding with standardized processes that ensure consistent due diligence and oversight, enforcing your organization's vendor risk policies.

Collect and maintain critical risk information from diverse sources like cybersecurity ratings, financial data, sanctions lists, and news alerts to generate risk scores and trigger necessary remediation actions.
Leverage cost-effective, standardized risk assessments, including on-site, desktop, and express options, delivered by accredited partners through the KY3P platform, reducing assessment burdens.
Gain a clear and transparent view of your organization's third-party risk landscape, enabling better identification, understanding, and management of potential vulnerabilities.
Establish and implement robust policies and controls for managing third-party risk, ensuring a structured and compliant approach to vendor management.
Accurately identify and assess the inherent risks associated with each third-party product or service, allowing for targeted risk mitigation strategies based on specific vendor profiles.
Continuously monitor vendors for significant events and changes that could impact their risk profiles, ensuring proactive risk management and timely responses to emerging threats.
Benefit from solutions and services designed by industry experts, incorporating best-in-class methodologies and driving efficiency and effectiveness in your third-party risk management program.

Product Overview.Overview: KY3P® Assessments streamline and simplify third-party risk management by providing a comprehensive solution for businesses reliant on external partners. Our assessments enable the seamless exchange of standardized and validated risk data, enhancing visibility into supply chain risks and allowing for customer-centric operations. Developed with a methodology aligned to global regulations and industry best practices by leading institutions, KY3P® Assessments empower businesses to optimize risk management outcomes and confidently navigate the evolving landscape of third-party risk.

Key Features.Description: Gain a holistic view of third-party risks with coverage across 26 control categories and 9 key risk domains, ensuring a broad understanding of your risk landscape.
Leverage KY3P's expert team to conduct assessments and validate controls, ensuring reliable and accurate risk data you can trust for informed decision-making.
Ensure compliance with global regulations and industry standards, including NIST CSF v2.0, ISO 27001/27002, NYDFS, GDPR, EU DORA, and APRA CPS230/232.
Facilitate seamless and efficient exchange of standardized, validated risk data between you and your service providers, simplifying communication and data collection.
Achieve greater transparency into your supply chain risks to proactively manage and mitigate potential issues, improving your overall risk posture.
Free up your internal resources by outsourcing data collection and validation, allowing your team to concentrate on strategic risk mitigation and management initiatives.
Rely on consistent and reliable processes for assessment and 100% quality control, ensuring the integrity and accuracy of your third-party risk data.
Benefit from a meticulously crafted and constantly evolving methodology that aligns with the latest regulatory requirements and industry best practices, keeping you ahead of the curve.

This enables users to efficiently benchmark portfolio performance, conduct in-depth analysis, and seamlessly integrate data into existing analytics tools, freeing up valuable time to focus on identifying opportunities.  Direct access to LCD analysts further enhances insights derived from the data.

Access the S&P/LSTA and European Leveraged Loan Indexes to effectively benchmark your portfolio against the US and European leveraged loan markets.

Product Overview.Overview: The Light Vehicle Forecast, originating from S&P Global Mobility (formerly IHS Markit), delivers comprehensive analysis of the global light vehicle market, covering over 145 countries across 11 regions and representing more than 97% of worldwide sales and production volume.  Authored by industry and economic experts across 10 countries, this dataset empowers users to monitor competitive product and segment trends, analyze customer growth, track technology adoption, understand OEM brand strength, and gauge market share within the automotive industry.

Key Features.Description: Access forecasts spanning 145+ countries and 11 regions, representing over 97% of the global light vehicle market.
Analyze data by sales and production region, market, country, strategic OEM group, brand, nameplate, and vehicle characteristics.
Explore vehicle details including Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW), production type, sales segment, design parent, platform, and program code.

Leverage forecasts developed by industry and economic experts located in 10 countries for reliable and insightful market perspectives.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Ratings' Liquidity Assessments offer tax-exempt debt issuers a comprehensive evaluation of their capacity to utilize their own liquid assets as a robust alternative to traditional bank liquidity facilities.  Designed for issuers of Commercial Paper (CP) and Variable Rate Demand Obligations (VRDO), these assessments provide an independent, in-depth analysis of an issuer's liquidity position, market risk exposure, and asset volatility. By analyzing portfolio holdings, management's liquidation strategies, and risk management frameworks, S&P Global Ratings delivers a clear understanding of an issuer's ability to self-provide liquidity support, potentially offering a cost-effective and administratively simpler solution compared to conventional bank-provided liquidity.

Key Features.Description: Gain a thorough understanding of your current cash, fixed-income portfolio, and liquid assets, evaluating their liquidity, market risk, and volatility for effective liquidity support.
Benefit from an expert review of your management's documented plans to convert assets to cash, providing a clear maximum dollar assessment of your self-liquidity capability.
Ensure your investment policies, risk-management procedures, and operations are robust and aligned with best practices through a detailed evaluation.
Receive an objective and trusted assessment from S&P Global Ratings, enhancing stakeholder confidence in your liquidity strategy.
Explore a potentially more cost-effective and less cumbersome option compared to traditional bank lines of credit and standby bond purchase agreements for liquidity support.
Maintain a continuous understanding of your liquidity profile with monthly monitoring of key portfolio information and annual management reviews to identify changes and ensure ongoing strength.
Engage in a clear and formal request process, ensuring a well-defined path to obtaining a comprehensive Liquidity Assessment.
Benefit from management meetings with S&P Global Ratings analysts for in-depth discussions and a thorough review of your liquidity position and strategies.

Product Overview.Overview: Access comprehensive commodity data with global coverage, focusing on the Energy and Utilities industry. Product Overview.Overview: The LNG Cargo dataset delivers comprehensive insights into global liquefied natural gas (LNG) trade flows.  It offers a detailed examination of individual LNG voyages, capturing critical data points from loading to unloading, including diversions, idling, and route analysis.  Beyond trip specifics, the dataset incorporates metadata on commercial entities involved in LNG trade, differentiating between short-term and long-term contracts, alongside trade volumes and geographical context. This rich dataset empowers users to dissect the complexities of LNG movements, enabling the creation of sophisticated trade flow analytics and a deeper understanding of the LNG market landscape for informed decision-making and future trend prediction.

Key Features.Description: Gain granular visibility into individual LNG cargo trips, from origin to destination, unlocking insights into voyage specifics.
Monitor critical events such as diversions and idling periods to understand voyage efficiency and potential disruptions.
Analyze evolving trade routes to identify trends and strategic shifts in LNG transportation patterns.
Understand the roles of different commercial entities, differentiating between short and long-term market players.
Access data on traded volumes and geographic information to quantify and visualize global LNG trade.
Aggregate data across multiple dimensions to develop sophisticated analytics for a comprehensive market view.
Leverage historical data and trend analysis to enhance the accuracy of future LNG trade flow predictions.
Combine detailed trip-level data with macro-level insights to achieve a holistic grasp of the LNG trade landscape.

Product Overview.Overview: The LNG Cargo Premium dataset delivers critical intelligence on LNG vessel journeys, empowering users to optimize logistics and trading strategies. By providing detailed information on bunkering, diversion, idling, journey points, and trade route events, this dataset enables deep insights into supply dynamics, route effectiveness, and evolving market trends. Traders, analysts, data scientists, and strategic planners can leverage this comprehensive data to enhance decision-making, build predictive models, and improve operational efficiencies within the LNG market.

Key Features.Description: Access precise timing data for bunkering events of both laden and ballast LNG vessels to optimize refueling strategies.
Monitor LNG diversions with location and timing details, including pre- and post-diversion destinations, to understand supply shifts.
Track LNG vessel idling locations and durations, serving as a valuable proxy for assessing floating storage levels and market imbalances.
Analyze vessel movements through critical journey points to enhance route planning and assess transit efficiency.
Gain visibility into LNG vessel traffic and waiting times across key trade routes to identify bottlenecks and market trends.
Improve LNG supply chain efficiency by leveraging comprehensive event data throughout the vessel journey.
Make more informed trading decisions with access to granular data on vessel activities and market events.
Utilize detailed cargo data to build predictive models, detect anomalies, and gain deeper market understanding.

Product Overview.Overview: LNG Market Data provides the essential intelligence for navigating the global LNG market. As the provider of Platts JKM, the global LNG benchmark, this service delivers actionable insights derived from extensive price data, including over 800 daily price assessments and a deep history of 15 years.  Offering unparalleled transparency with 1,000+ monthly bids, offers, and trades, and covering 9 global LNG price benchmarks, LNG bunker fuel, and freight rates, LNG Market Data empowers professionals to identify opportunities, manage risks, and make informed decisions in this dynamic industry.

Key Features.Description: Access extensive daily spot and term price assessments, forming the foundation for contract negotiations and risk management.
Leverage 9 key LNG price benchmarks across all regions, including the Platts JKM, to understand global market dynamics.
Monitor LNG bunker fuel, freight rates, and JKM physical forwards, gaining a holistic view of the LNG market.
Unlock full price history to analyze market trends, identify patterns, and develop informed trading strategies.
Rely on independent Platts assessments, built on rigorous methodology and trusted by industry professionals worldwide.
Receive data via desktop, mobile, cloud services, data feeds, or APIs, integrating seamlessly into your existing systems.
Benefit from data gathered from a diverse range of over 80 approved market participants, ensuring robust and representative pricing.

It is designed to empower industry professionals with the data needed to analyze LNG demand routes across diverse markets and navigate the complexities of the global energy landscape.

Key Features.Description: Access extensive data tables encompassing gas balances, demand, reserves, storage, and sales for a holistic view of the LNG market.
Provides the necessary data to analyze and understand complex LNG demand routes across various global markets.

Explore multiple facets of the market with data on gas balances, demand, reserves, sales, infrastructure, power, and pricing.
Benefit from monthly and annual data updates ensuring you have access to the most current market information.
Gain insights into the worldwide LNG market with data spanning diverse geographic regions and markets.
Data is accessible through various channels including API, Cloud platforms (AWS, Databricks, Snowflake), and Excel Add-In for seamless integration.

Product Overview.Overview: Unlock the complexities of the global LNG market with LNG Market Insights, your trusted source for timely data, pricing, and independent analysis. In a rapidly evolving energy landscape, especially with recent geopolitical shifts, LNG has emerged as a critical fuel. This service provides comprehensive coverage of the LNG value chain, offering short and long-term supply and demand forecasts, price assessments including the JKM benchmark, and detailed information on assets and contracts. Stay ahead of market trends with insights into liquefaction plants, import and regasification terminals, and gain the transparency needed to navigate and capitalize on opportunities in the LNG market.

Key Features.Description: Stay informed with daily updates on LNG pricing fluctuations, market-moving news, commentary, and tender information, enabling you to evaluate market positions and potential trades swiftly.
Access comprehensive research reports covering short-term trends to long-term strategic analysis, empowering informed strategic and commercial decision-making in the dynamic LNG market.

Explore over 150 interactive dashboards on market fundamentals and 100+ on trade flow, facilitating quick investigation of trends, customized analysis, and real-time insights into LNG demand drivers and market dynamics.
Access an expansive library of detailed project profiles for liquefaction and regasification facilities, ensuring you are up-to-date on project developments and performance globally.

Product Overview.Overview: The LNG Netbacks dataset offers crucial metrics for understanding price variations across different geographical locations in the LNG market. By calculating the netback price—the price received by the supplier after deducting shipping costs and considering end market prices—this dataset enables users to identify the most profitable markets for selling LNG. It provides a comprehensive view by factoring in a five-day moving average for both end market prices and shipping costs, based on specified supply and import geographies. This allows for granular analysis of daily netbacks, facilitating strategic decision-making and a deeper understanding of global import and export dynamics in the LNG sector.

Key Features.Description: Identify the most profitable markets to sell LNG by leveraging comprehensive netback calculations.
Conduct detailed analysis of daily netback data, enabling precise market timing and strategy adjustments.
Access extensive netback information, providing a holistic view of price dynamics in the LNG market.
Gain valuable insights into global import and export trends and dynamics within the LNG industry.
Tailor netback analysis to specific needs using data points including date, export geography, and import geography.
Make informed and strategic decisions based on timely and accurate daily netback data.
Understand the true price to the supplier after accounting for key costs like shipping and market prices.
Benefit from netback calculations based on five-day moving averages, smoothing out short-term volatility for more reliable analysis.

Product Overview.Overview: The LNG Outages dataset provides comprehensive information on planned and unplanned outages impacting LNG liquefaction facilities globally.  This dataset is designed for trend analysis and historical comparison, offering detailed insights into current, imminent, and past outages within a specified timeframe. It covers various aspects of liquefaction outages, segmented by status, confidence level, and project, enabling users to understand the dynamics of LNG supply disruptions.

Key Features.Description: Analyze outage data categorized by planned or unplanned status and confidence level for a nuanced understanding of outage reliability.
Gain insights into different stages and reasons for LNG outages through categorized data, facilitating detailed root cause analysis.
Conduct focused analysis with comprehensive outage data specific to individual liquefaction projects, enhancing project-level risk assessment.
Easily differentiate and analyze various projects within the dataset using a unique list of liquefaction project names.
Leverage historical outage data dating back to 2011 for identifying trends and patterns in LNG facility performance.
Access data on LNG outages from facilities worldwide, providing a comprehensive global perspective on supply disruptions.
Integrate outage data seamlessly into existing workflows with flexible delivery options via API and cloud platforms like AWS, Databricks, and Snowflake.
Stay informed with timely updates on LNG outages with variable reporting frequency to capture dynamic market events.

Product Overview.Overview: Navigate the complexities of the LNG market with confidence using LNG Risk Market Data, powered by Platts Forward Curves. This comprehensive solution provides an independent and verifiable source of data, essential for effective risk management in today's uncertain commodity markets.  Offering extensive global coverage with over 13 LNG forward curves and more than 1,250 daily forward prices, and extending insights up to 240 months, it empowers professionals to understand market dynamics, manage risks, and optimize trading strategies.

Key Features.Description: Access editorially assessed and quantitatively derived forward curves data and visualization for key trading hubs, providing a clear view of market trends.
Benefit from forward curve assessments across major global locations in Asia, Europe, and the Americas, ensuring a comprehensive global perspective.

Monitor dynamic commodity markets with extensive price data, facilitating confident contract negotiations and robust risk management.
Easily embed data into your daily workflow to calculate key risk metrics like VaR, manage price risk, and analyze market conditions efficiently.
Receive data via Platts Connect, API, FTP, CI Excel Add-In, and through channel partners, ensuring seamless integration with your systems.
Understand the market assessment process with a clearly defined methodology, ensuring data consistency and quality you can trust.
Leverage extensive historical data to conduct in-depth market analysis, validate internal curves, and gain a deeper understanding of market evolution.

Product Overview.Overview: The Loans Pricing dataset, originating from IHS Markit, offers independent and transparent pricing, analytics, and liquidity metrics for over 8,000 leveraged loan facilities worldwide. Leveraging contributor-based loan pricing engines, sophisticated parsing technology, and an evaluated methodology, this dataset enables users to effectively market, manage risk, and support informed trading and investment decisions within the leveraged loan market. It includes extensive price history, liquidity indicators, and mapping to industry identifiers.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Ratings is a leading credit rating agency for Local Government Investment Pools (LGIPs) in the United States, with over three decades of experience in the sector.  They analyze LGIPs with diverse participant structures and experienced management, offering three distinct rating types tailored to a pool's investment objective: Principal Stability Fund Ratings, Fund Credit Quality Ratings, and Fund Volatility Ratings.  These ratings provide forward-looking opinions on principal stability, credit quality, and return volatility, supported by rigorous weekly or monthly surveillance and annual management reviews, with enhanced monitoring during volatile market conditions to ensure ongoing assessment and risk management.

Key Features.Description: Provides forward-looking opinions (PSFR) on an LGIP's ability to maintain principal and limit credit risk losses, offering assurance of capital preservation.
Fund Credit Quality Ratings (FCQR) assess the overall creditworthiness of fixed-income investment funds, indicating the strength and safety of the fund's portfolio holdings.
Fund Volatility Ratings (FVR) offer a forward-looking view on a fund's return volatility relative to a benchmark, helping investors understand potential return fluctuations.
Benefit from S&P Global Ratings' extensive experience and leading position in LGIP ratings since 1992, ensuring trusted and knowledgeable assessments.
Regular weekly or monthly surveillance and annual management reviews provide continuous monitoring of LGIPs, ensuring ratings reflect current portfolio and management practices.
Enhanced surveillance protocols during volatile market periods offer proactive risk management and ensure ratings remain robust even in stressed conditions.
Offers three distinct rating types to specifically address different LGIP investment objectives, providing relevant and focused evaluations for various pool strategies.
Clear and defined rating scales for each rating type ('AAAm' to 'Dm', 'AAAf' to 'Df', 'S1' to 'S5') provide easily understandable benchmarks for risk and performance assessment.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence’s Loss Given Default (LGD) models and Scorecards offer a comprehensive solution to enhance your assessment of default risk exposure.  Proactively evaluate and refine your potential exposure to defaults with our unique approach that incorporates qualitative and quantitative factors for bond-specific, forward-looking LGD estimates. Benefit from a transparent and validated methodology, demonstrated predictive power through annual updates and backtesting, and extensive sector coverage to gain a complete view of potential expected credit losses across diverse industries.

Key Features.Description: Incorporate qualitative and quantitative factors to produce bond-specific, forward-looking estimates of loss for secured or unsecured loan exposures.
Validated and benchmarked models with inputs tailored to reflect asset-class specifics, ensuring a clear and understandable process.
Updated annually and rigorously backtested, our LGD Scorecards offer robust accuracy and consistency across various market conditions and geographies.
Gain a comprehensive view of potential credit losses across corporate, asset, project, oil & gas, sovereign, and financial sectors with our broad coverage.
Utilize our IFRS 9 and Basel compliant scorecard, designed to meet the requirements of credit institutions.
Leverage data from CreditPro® on over 1000+ defaulted companies to enrich your analysis.
Benefit from S&P Global Ratings' 150+ years of subject-matter expertise embedded within our credit assessment solutions.
An immediately available solution that requires no internal development, maintenance, or dedicated resources.

Product Overview.Overview: LossStats® Model is an advanced statistical tool designed to estimate the distribution of loss given default (LGD) for corporate loans and bonds in both the US and European markets.  Developed by S&P Global Market Intelligence, this model addresses the limitations of traditional LGD estimation methods by leveraging an extensive recovery database and incorporating both exposure-specific and macroeconomic factors. LossStats provides financial practitioners, risk analysts, and investment managers with a robust, data-driven solution to assess credit risk, optimize capital requirements, and identify new business opportunities in various credit markets.

Key Features.Description: Employs a sophisticated statistical framework, moving beyond simple averages to deliver a distribution of potential LGD outcomes for a more nuanced risk assessment.
Calibrated using a proprietary database of over 30 years of US and 14 years of European recovery data, ensuring robust and reliable LGD estimations.
Analyzes loans and bonds issued by both financial and non-financial corporate companies in the US and Europe, offering broad applicability.
Incorporates crucial exposure characteristics like collateral type and debt structure, providing tailored LGD estimates reflecting specific deal terms.
Integrates macroeconomic factors such as regional default rates and Euribor yield spread, adjusting for economic cycles and providing context-aware analysis.
Enables users to perform ‘what-if’ analyses and stress-test input factors, facilitating proactive risk management and informed decision-making.
Can be used standalone or in conjunction with other S&P Global Market Intelligence models like PD Model Market Signals and CreditModel™ 2.6 for a holistic credit risk view.
Offers surveillance dashboards, batch scoring, and report generation with dynamic links to presentation tools, streamlining workflows and enhancing communication.

Product Overview.Overview: The MBX, IOS & PO indices are synthetic total return swap index series designed to track the interest and principal components of agency pools. These indices provide investors with tools to gain exposure to or hedge against mortgage prepayment risk. Derived from the cashflows of underlying agency pools, IOS indices focus on the interest component, offering a liquid and standardized way to take long or short positions based on prepayment assumptions. PO indices, on the other hand, represent the principal component linked to the corresponding IOS indices.

Key Features.Description: Gain specific exposure to interest-only (IOS), principal-only (PO), or combined principal and interest components of agency pools to align with your investment strategies.
Access sub-indices categorized by agency, coupon, vintage, and term, allowing for highly specific market analysis and investment decisions.
Utilize these indices as effective hedging tools against fluctuations in mortgage prepayment rates, beneficial for servicing rights, agency pass-throughs, and similar instruments.
Benefit from a liquid and standardized index series, facilitating ease of trading and integration into portfolio management strategies.
IOS indices provide a direct and transparent way to manage and trade interest rate risk associated with agency mortgage-backed securities.
PO indices offer a focused tool to manage and trade the principal value component of agency mortgage-backed securities.
Gain synthetic exposure to the components of agency pools through total return swaps, offering flexibility and efficiency.
Suitable for a range of applications, including portfolio construction, hedging, relative value trading, and expressing views on mortgage prepayment behavior.
