Product.Product Name: Portfolio Valuations: Best Execution Ñ OTC Derivatives

Product Overview.Overview: Portfolio Valuations — Best Execution: OTC Derivatives is an independent, multi-contributor service designed to provide post-trade performance data for measuring and managing best execution in OTC derivatives. In response to evolving market practices and regulations like MiFID II, this service helps firms meet best execution requirements by offering time-stamped valuation data, enabling the calculation of trade slippage, and providing insights into transaction costs. With coverage across a wide range of asset classes and derivative types, this solution supports comprehensive transaction cost analysis, enhances execution quality monitoring, and facilitates regulatory reporting, ultimately improving trading effectiveness.

Key Features.Description: Provides best-in-class, time-stamped valuation data specifically for OTC derivatives, crucial for monitoring intraday and historic transaction costs and meeting best execution requirements.
Seamlessly calculates OTC trade slippage, the difference between executed and expected prices, expressed in various price and market sensitivity terms to confirm execution quality.
Extends sophisticated best execution and TCA tools beyond traditional assets to include OTC derivatives, complementing existing coverage for Equities, Bonds, FX, and more.
Validates and contextualizes the effectiveness of each OTC derivative transaction, providing key inputs for comprehensive transaction cost analysis and reporting.
Encompasses a wide range of vanilla and exotic derivatives across Interest Rates, Equities, FX, Credit, Commodities, and Structured Products for broad market analysis.
Offers rapid delivery turnaround even for large and complex portfolios, providing a collated output file for efficient processing of trades executed over a period.

Provides trade translation services to assist with connectivity to existing systems and simplifies onboarding for users of Portfolio Valuations and MarkitServ services by leveraging existing connections.
Delivers outputs comprised of arrival price and slippage metrics, including Greeks and Sensitivities, alongside additional valuation support metrics for clear and detailed analysis.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence's Portfolio Valuations CCP Connectivity Service simplifies the complex process of obtaining valuations for derivatives and cash instruments across multiple Central Counterparties (CCPs). This service provides a single, unified interface to connect with leading CCPs, eliminating the operational burden and costs associated with managing disparate CCP connections.  Institutions benefit from consistent, timely access to cleared prices for OTC trades, along with the option for independent price verification using the Portfolio Valuations Service, ensuring operational efficiency and data reliability.

Key Features.Description: Access cleared prices from all major CCPs through a single, consistent interface, streamlining connectivity and simplifying workflows.
Reduce operational complexities and costs by eliminating the need to manage multiple bespoke CCP connections.
Receive trade-level standard sensitivity measures alongside cleared prices, providing deeper insights and risk transparency.
Obtain valuations for a broad range of instruments, including OTC interest rates, credit derivatives, and global exchanges across all asset classes.
Verify CCP-provided prices with independent valuations from Portfolio Valuations for enhanced accuracy and control.
Access clearing prices on a same-day basis, enabling timely incorporation into daily Net Asset Value (NAV) calculations and reporting.
Rely on a service with processes and infrastructure rigorously validated through annual external audits (SAS70, SSAE16, ISAE3420 Type II).
Ensure consistent and timely receipt of OTC cleared prices, facilitating robust valuation processes.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence's Portfolio Valuations Scenario Analysis Service offers an independent and validated solution for financial firms needing valuations under both standard and stressed market conditions. This service enables a deeper understanding of market exposure and improved risk measurement by providing consistent and accurate valuations. Customizable stress scenarios can be applied to various market data points, allowing for flexible analysis alongside regular valuations to enhance operational efficiency and meet evolving regulatory and risk management demands.

Key Features.Description: Receive scenario analysis results alongside independent valuations, eliminating the need to re-upload trade details and streamlining workflows.
Benefit from a service with processes and infrastructure that have consistently passed annual external audits under SSAE16 and ISAE3420 Type II standards since 2009, ensuring reliability and trust.
Re-evaluate positions under stress scenarios using the same robust algorithms and pricing models as standard valuations, maintaining consistent metrics and reliable results.
Fully customize shock scenarios to meet specific client requirements, with configurable data points, shock types, and magnitudes for tailored analysis.
Access scenario analysis functionality across all asset classes supported by Markit Portfolio Valuations, including credit, commodities, interest rates, equities, FX, hybrids, and structured notes.
Gain a clearer understanding of market exposure and improve the accuracy of liquidity, funding, and market risk measurements through stressed scenario valuations.
Address evolving regulatory demands, accounting standards, and risk management processes requiring valuations under both standard and stressed market scenarios.
Rely on a service that ensures consistent market data, bootstrapping algorithms, and pricing frameworks for both valuations and scenario analysis, promoting reliable and comparable results.

Product Overview.Overview: The Portfolio Valuations Trade Booking service offers a comprehensive trade capture solution, enabling clients to outsource their trade booking processes efficiently and accurately. By leveraging experienced portfolio valuation analysts, the service streamlines trade execution, reduces operational burdens, and minimizes risks associated with manual data entry and template completion. This service is designed to improve accuracy, enhance operational efficiency, and provide flexibility across a wide range of financial instruments.

Key Features.Description: Simplify your workflow by outsourcing trade booking via trade confirmations and term sheets, freeing up internal resources.
Benefit from the knowledge of portfolio valuation analysts to ensure accurate and efficient trade booking.
Minimize the time and effort spent on filling out complex trade templates and confirming input accuracy.
Decrease errors, upload failures, and pricing discrepancies often associated with manual trade processing.
Utilize the service for all instrument types within your portfolio, including both standard and complex exotic instruments.
Easily submit required trade details through user-friendly channels like email or a web interface.
Analysts handle trade confirmation and setup directly in your account, ensuring seamless integration.
Receive an indicative price before trade confirmation, providing clarity and control over trade execution.

Product Overview.Overview: Portfolio Valuations: Trade Data Connectivity streamlines the process of calculating mark-to-market valuations for OTC derivatives by providing automated connectivity between S&P Global Market Intelligence's Portfolio Valuations service and OSTTRA MarkitWire. This integration eliminates manual data entry and conversion, automatically capturing confirmed trade information for interest rate, equity, and credit derivatives.  The hosted service assists institutions in meeting regulatory requirements for independent valuation and NAV calculation, enhancing operational efficiency and reducing risk, and is available to Portfolio Valuations customers at no additional cost.

Key Features.Description: Automatically pulls confirmed OTC derivatives trade information from OSTTRA MarkitWire, eliminating manual processes.
Creates a more efficient and less error-prone workflow by removing the need for manual data manipulation.
Reduces operational overhead by automating trade data population and maintenance of trade feeds.
Ensures a quick and easy onboarding experience for the Portfolio Valuations service.
Provides clear visibility and transparency into the trade information used in valuations through the Portfolio Valuations web interface.
Minimizes errors and enhances the accuracy of valuations through a more streamlined and real-time process.
Offers customizable permissioning based on trade type, LEI (Legal Entity Identifier), and BOOK for granular control.
Enables real-time trade capture as trades are confirmed and facilitates same-day valuation turnaround for new or amended trades.

Product Overview.Overview: The Trade Translation service for Portfolio Valuations simplifies the process of integrating custom trade data into S&P Global Market Intelligence's valuation platform. This service offers both input and output mapping, enabling clients to submit trade information in their preferred file formats and receive valuation outputs customized to their specific needs. By automating the translation process, it eliminates manual data handling, ensures seamless connectivity, and allows clients to leverage S&P Global's best-in-class valuation engine with their existing systems.

Key Features.Description: Submit trade data in your preferred format (CSV, XML, Excel, etc.) for seamless integration with the Portfolio Valuations system.
Receive valuation outputs tailored to your downstream systems and reporting requirements, ensuring data compatibility.
Establish automated data transfer via HTTPS, SFTP, or web front-end, minimizing manual intervention and enhancing efficiency.
Easily integrate the service with your existing trade management and accounting systems, reducing implementation complexity.
Maintain your current systems while leveraging S&P Global's advanced Portfolio Valuations models and methodologies.
Experience a quick and easy onboarding process, enabling rapid deployment and minimizing disruption.
Gain full visibility into the data submitted for valuations, ensuring clarity and control over the process.
Benefit from industry-leading valuation models, methodologies, and dedicated analyst support for accurate and reliable results.

Product Overview.Overview: The Ports dataset, originating from IHS Markit, offers comprehensive global port information, detailing over 6,900 ports, 17,000 terminals, and 44,000 berths worldwide.  This dataset provides geospatial positions for each location and indicates the commodities handled, with over 90% completeness for berths.  It also includes critical details like UNLOCODES, vessel restrictions, bunker availability, free trade zones, annual cargo throughput, terminal storage, and MARPOL reception facilities.  Common applications include integration with navigation software, overlaying on Electronic Navigational Charts, and advanced analysis when combined with port and berth movement data.

Key Features.Description: Access data for over 6,900 ports, 17,000 terminals, and 44,000 berths globally, providing a comprehensive view of worldwide port infrastructure.
Obtain granular data including geospatial locations, commodity handling details, UNLOCODES, and vessel restrictions for thorough port analysis.
Understand commodity handling at ports and berths with high completeness, crucial for market analysis and trade flow understanding.
Access information on bunker availability, free trade zones, terminal storage, and MARPOL facilities, vital for operational planning and compliance.
Leverage historical data starting from 2019 for trend analysis and understanding long-term port development.
Integrate seamlessly with bridge navigation software and Electronic Navigational Charts for improved voyage planning and maritime safety.
Combine with port and berth movement datasets for deeper insights into port activity, congestion analysis, and maritime traffic patterns.
Data is collected from multiple authoritative sources including coastguards, port authorities, and maritime administrations, ensuring high data accuracy and reliability.

Product Overview.Overview: Navigate the complexities of the global potash market with S&P Global Commodity Insights' comprehensive analysis and futures forecasts. Leveraging Fertecon's expertise and S&P Global's robust data ecosystem, this service provides in-depth insights into supply and demand dynamics, market trends, and price movements. Empowering Muriate of Potash (MOP) buyers and sellers, this analysis equips you with the foresight and understanding necessary to optimize strategies, anticipate market shifts, and make well-informed decisions in this critical agricultural commodity market.

Key Features.Description: Access thorough supply-demand assessments to confidently navigate the MOP market as a buyer or seller, maximizing your market potential.
Identify critical trends, predict price movements, and pinpoint future price inflection points with monthly price analysis for a significant competitive advantage.
Leverage comprehensive supply data to understand market supply strategies and competitive dynamics, enabling you to optimize your market approach.
Gain crucial contextual insight into recent market events and their impact on future supply, demand, and pricing to adapt strategies and capitalize on opportunities.
Receive summaries and analyses of immediate market developments to stay informed and react swiftly to changes.
Understand the demand landscape with regional breakdowns and detailed coverage of the top 22 national MOP markets, representing over 80% of global demand.
Gain insights into the global supply side with coverage of all major MOP suppliers worldwide.
Evaluate current supply costs and margins from key FOB export points to understand profitability drivers and competitive positioning.

Product Overview.Overview: PowerTools® is an intuitive, Windows-based software solution meticulously designed to empower oil and gas professionals with rapid and accurate reservoir and economic analysis. This powerful tool enables users to efficiently evaluate reserves, income potential, net present value, and undeveloped opportunities. Seamlessly integrating with other S&P Global applications and content, PowerTools® facilitates well-informed business decisions by providing quick and easy reserve estimations for a large number of wells, ultimately maximizing well production and optimizing asset management.

Key Features.Description: Utilize automatic decline curve fitting or intuitively refine evaluations with click-and-drag functionality, enabling detailed analysis and comparisons based on prices, expenses, and taxes.
Input and visualize multiple leases in a single location, enhancing spatial understanding with customizable bubbles and color contour maps for improved asset management.

Analyze multiple Estimated Ultimate Recoveries (EURs) concurrently with production decline curve analysis, leveraging static pressure data for Material Balance analysis and volumetric calculations to substantiate estimates.

Generate over 65 pre-designed oil and gas reports, including cash flow summaries, production reports, and hybrid reports, on-demand with updated well, subtotal, and grand total summaries for streamlined reporting.
Experience a hassle-free installation process complemented by built-in audio tutorials and comprehensive help documents, ensuring a smooth user onboarding.
Effortlessly compare multiple scenarios by adjusting variables such as price, expenses, taxes, investments, and interests, facilitating robust decision-making and risk assessment.
Leverage near-seamless integration with S&P Global Commodity Insights content, engineering, and geological interpretation applications, enhancing workflow and data accessibility.
Access Enerdeq™ Browser for on-demand oil and gas production data, import and analyze Petra® project data, and review updated lease information with FieldDIRECT™ for comprehensive data management.

Product Overview.Overview: The Preqin Alternative Asset Fund Performance dataset, provided by Preqin, offers comprehensive analytics and research for the alternative assets industry, covering private equity, private debt, hedge funds, real estate, infrastructure, and natural resources. This dataset empowers users to enhance critical workflows such as fundraising, investor relations, asset allocation, portfolio management, fund manager selection, and business development by providing access to fund performance metrics, profiles for funds, managers, and investors, benchmark data, and private equity relationship and deal cross-reference information.

Key Features.Description: Gain insights across private equity, private debt, hedge funds, real estate, infrastructure, and natural resources.
Leverage analytics and research to support strategic decisions in fundraising, investment, and portfolio management.
Access profiles of over 204,000 funds, 62,000 fund managers, and 33,000 institutional investors for comprehensive market understanding.
Utilize private capital market benchmark data for over 9,000 private capital funds to evaluate fund performance.
Explore Private Equity Relationships integrating Preqin and CIQ data to understand industry connections.
Integrate and analyze multiple deals with Private Equity & Private Debt cross-reference data and transaction identifiers.
Access point-in-time fund performance data with quarterly 'As at Date' for historical analysis dating back to 1977.
Obtain data through Cloud, Desktop, Feed, and platforms like Marketplace Workbench, S&P Capital IQ Pro, Snowflake, and Xpressfeed™.

Product Overview.Overview: Price Viewer is an intuitive web-based platform by S&P Global Market Intelligence offering streamlined access to pricing, valuations, and reference data across a broad spectrum of financial instruments. This solution provides comprehensive market data and analytics for bonds, credit, loans, equities, FX, rates, OTC derivatives, and securitized products. Users can access live streaming and historical data, instrument details, liquidity metrics, and transparency insights, all within a user-friendly interface.

Key Features.Description: Gain access to pricing and reference data for over 3 million instruments across fixed income, derivatives, and equities through a single interface.
Stream live pricing updates for select corporate and sovereign bonds and CDS.
Access both current and historical data via charts, curves, and other formats for in-depth analysis.
Utilize screener tools to identify securities and create watchlists to easily monitor their performance and movements.
Easily connect with pricing evaluators for price challenges and coverage requests directly within the platform.
Access data through various methods including flat file delivery, API access, and an Excel plug-in.
Obtain detailed instrument information supplemented by issuer and sector curves for deeper insights.
Leverage liquidity and transparency metrics in addition to quote and trade data for informed decision-making.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence's Pricing and Reference Data service offers high-quality, independent pricing data designed to optimize trading, inform investment decisions, and mitigate risk.  Spanning a wide range of fixed income and derivative asset classes, including market-leading coverage in CDS and loans, this service leverages sophisticated technology and transparent methodologies.  Flexible delivery options and expert support ensure tailored solutions for your investment, risk, and reporting needs.

Key Features.Description: Access reliable and independent pricing data for accurate analysis and decision-making.
Coverage across a wide range of fixed income and derivative asset classes, including specialized areas like CDS and loans, CLOs, and various bond sectors.
Choose delivery methods that suit your workflow, including flat files, API access, Excel plug-in, and a web portal.
Gain confidence with clear and transparent pricing methodologies, understanding the sources and calculations behind the data.
Powered by a sophisticated technology engine ensuring efficient data processing and reliable delivery.
Benefit from the insights of leading fixed income experts and 24x7 customer service.
Seamlessly integrate data into existing systems through extensive third-party relationships and platform integrations.
Utilize the data for various critical use cases including end-of-day NAV calculations, independent price verification, risk management, and price discovery.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Ratings' Principal Stability Fund Ratings (PSFR) are forward-looking opinions designed to help investors assess the stability of principal in fixed-income funds, particularly money market funds.  Established in 1984, PSFRs provide an independent evaluation of a fund's capacity to maintain a stable net asset value and limit potential losses from credit risk.  The ratings, ranging from 'AAAm' to 'Dm', offer a clear view of principal stability, distinct from traditional credit ratings that focus on a borrower's financial obligations.

Key Features.Description: Gain an unbiased and forward-looking opinion on the risks that could affect the stability of a fund's principal.
Leverage a clear, established methodology focused on critical factors impacting net asset value, including credit, counterparty, and liquidity risks.
Benefit from annual review meetings with our experienced fund ratings analytical team for in-depth discussions.
Rely on our dedicated team's weekly monitoring of key fund metrics and portfolio holdings to ensure ongoing stability.
Quickly interpret principal stability with our clear and intuitive rating scale, ranging from 'AAAm' to 'Dm'.
Our ratings consider credit quality, diversification, maturity, liquidity, and the strength of fund management and risk controls.
We conduct weekly surveillance to promptly identify and assess any changes that may impact a fund's credit profile.
During volatile market conditions, we intensify our surveillance, potentially including daily interactions, to maintain rating accuracy.

Product Overview.Overview: Prism Virtual Data Room (VDR), originating from IHS Markit and offered by S&P Global Market Intelligence, is a simple and secure web-based platform designed to streamline document and data sharing for sophisticated financial firms, particularly in private equity and venture capital. It facilitates due diligence, M&A transactions, capital raising, investor reporting, board communications, and more, providing a faster and more secure way to manage sensitive information with industry-leading security features and an intuitive user interface.

Key Features.Description: Intuitively manage any data sharing challenge with a virtual data room.
Easily set up deal rooms for M&A transactions, capital raises, and investor reporting.
Securely access, view, and annotate documents from anywhere using a native mobile app.
Simplify portfolio reporting with direct integration to iLEVEL.
Quickly start projects with an intuitive setup, fast uploads, and simple permission settings.
Manage and view access at firm, contact, and document levels through a user-friendly permission matrix.
Provide a clear and understandable interface for investors, partners, and counterparties.
Ensure data security and compliance with robust encryption and watermarking.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence's Private Company Data solution, accessible through S&P Capital IQ Pro, provides unparalleled insights into the private company landscape, a sector representing 90% of businesses globally yet often lacking in transparent data.  This comprehensive dataset encompasses over 53 million company profiles, millions of financial statements, and professional contacts, enabling users to uncover investment opportunities, conduct thorough risk assessments, and perform detailed peer comparisons. By unlocking big data on small companies, this solution empowers informed decision-making across various workflows, from deal sourcing to credit risk analysis, and offers flexible data integration options to suit diverse user needs.

Key Features.Description: Gain access to over 53 million private company profiles globally, offering a deep and wide-ranging view of the market.
Leverage over 14 million recent financial statements to analyze financial health and performance of private entities.
Explore over 85 million professional profiles linked to private companies, facilitating networking and due diligence efforts.
Understand complex relationships with over 3 million corporate structure connections, enhancing risk assessment and market understanding.
Discover over 1 million early-stage companies, providing insights into future market trends and investment opportunities.
Uncover standardized financial metrics, funding rounds, valuations, and employee data for informed analysis.
Utilize Credit Analytics solutions to assign credit scores to unrated private companies, improving risk management.
Key Features.Feature: Credit Risk Scoring for Private Firms

Key Features.Description: Seamlessly integrate private company data into your workflows via API, Cloud, or Xpressfeed for optimal efficiency.

Product Overview.Overview: The Private Company Financials dataset delivers comprehensive financial intelligence, offering 200+ standardized financial statement items for over 12 million private companies worldwide. Integrated within the S&P Capital IQ Fundamentals platform, this dataset empowers users to conduct in-depth research for prospective investments, efficiently identify merger and acquisition opportunities, and proactively monitor the financial health of portfolio companies. With global coverage spanning North America, Europe (from 2004), and Asia-Pacific (from 2012), it provides a robust historical perspective for strategic financial analysis.

Key Features.Description: Access over 200 consistently formatted financial statement items, enabling easy comparison and analysis across companies.
Explore the financial landscape of over 12 million private companies worldwide, providing a broad and deep market view.
Leverage historical data starting from 2004 for North America and Europe, and 2012 for Asia-Pacific, to analyze financial trends and performance over time.
Seamlessly utilize this dataset within the S&P Capital IQ Fundamentals offering for a unified and efficient research workflow.
Enhance your due diligence process and uncover promising investment opportunities within the private company sector.
Streamline the identification and evaluation of potential merger and acquisition targets based on comprehensive financial data.
Gain continuous insights into the financial performance and stability of your private company portfolio holdings.
Access data through various channels including API, Cloud, Desktop, and Feed, ensuring integration into your preferred systems and workflows.

Product Overview.Overview: Private Credit Analysis (PCA) is a confidential tool designed to assess the creditworthiness of unrated entities, providing a crucial third-party perspective on counterparty risk. Unlike a formal credit rating, PCA delivers a credit estimate accompanied by a detailed written report explaining the rationale behind the assessment. This service offers a point-in-time snapshot of an entity's likelihood of default, empowering financial professionals to make informed decisions when public credit ratings are unavailable and to better understand and manage their exposure to unrated issuers.

Key Features.Description: Receive a clear credit assessment expressed as a grade, accompanied by a detailed written analysis explaining the entity's strengths, weaknesses, and financial profile.
Leverage an unbiased, third-party perspective to evaluate credit risk, enhancing confidence in your decision-making process.
Analyze the credit quality of new and existing counterparties, borrowers, suppliers, and other entities to effectively manage financial exposures.
Benefit from the expertise of credit analysts who provide specific industry and company insights, improving your understanding of sector-specific risks.
Augment your institution's credit analysis capabilities, particularly for credits that fall outside your team's traditional expertise or capacity.
Utilize PCA to assess credit risks associated with potential portfolio acquisitions or individual targets, informing strategic investment decisions.
Inform the setting of appropriate credit terms, such as limits and pricing, based on a robust third-party credit assessment.
Obtain a discreet credit analysis that respects confidentiality, and have the option to request updates to maintain the relevance of the assessment over time.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence provides comprehensive solutions for the evolving private credit market, a $1.5T+ industry poised for significant growth. Their end-to-end ecosystem empowers private credit managers to navigate increasing complexity and competition by offering differentiated data, advanced analytics, and streamlined workflows.  From origination to surveillance, these solutions enable greater efficiency in sourcing deals, enhanced rigor in risk assessment, and improved visibility and efficiency in loan administration and portfolio management, ultimately helping managers scale operations, align with credit rating agency practices, and differentiate their strategies for superior returns.

Key Features.Description: Comprehensive suite of data, analytics, and workflows covering the entire private credit lifecycle, from deal origination to ongoing portfolio surveillance.
Access to qualitative and comparative datasets including credit ratings, performance data, and expert judgement scorecards for informed decision-making.
Utilize sophisticated quantitative risk assessment models with macro-economic stress testing to analyze and manage risk within the opaque private credit asset class.
Powerful software and services to support origination, underwriting, loan administration, portfolio management, and investor reporting, improving operational efficiency.
Leverage Climate RiskGauge to estimate the financial impact of climate-related risks on investments, incorporating crucial ESG considerations.
Utilize iLEVEL + WSO for streamlined portfolio management and loan administration, enhancing transparency and performance reporting.
Employ loan platforms for online settlement, secure wire instructions, and seamless position reconciliation, reducing process friction and legal costs.
Access timely and independent valuations on hard-to-value debt instruments performed by leading valuation experts, ensuring fair and accurate assessments.

Product Overview.Overview: The Private Debt Solution is a fully integrated platform designed for credit managers and direct lenders to streamline workflows and enhance performance in the increasingly complex private debt market. It addresses the challenges of administrative burden and intricate deal structures by offering tools for pipeline management, portfolio oversight, compliance, and risk mitigation, ultimately enabling more informed decisions across the entire investment lifecycle. By providing an end-to-end workflow, a unified view of holdings, and automated reporting, the solution empowers users to optimize operations and improve overall investment outcomes.

Key Features.Description: Connect front, middle, and back offices for efficient information sharing throughout the deal lifecycle, improving deal flow and collaboration.
Access research tools, pre-deal analysis, and an investment committee dashboard to strengthen due diligence and decision-making in the underwriting process.
Manage multi-fund compliance, streamline allocation, and benefit from entity mastering and deal onboarding support, all within a centralized execution dashboard.
Track diverse assets, portfolios, and positions while streamlining data entry and enabling data comparison across multiple sources for accurate reconciliation.
Minimize administrative burdens associated with private debt placement by outsourcing back-office operations, allowing focus on core investment activities.
Support workflows for deal onboarding, credit surveillance, performance reporting, covenant tracking, and investor reporting to maintain a holistic view of portfolio performance.
Utilize valuation software and services to automate the valuation process and enhance internal valuations with assurance reviews for greater accuracy and efficiency.
Eliminate manual financial statement processing and digitize data to establish a single source of truth for accurate reporting and improved data management.

Product.Product Name: Private Equity and Private Debt Fair Value Services

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global's Private Equity and Private Debt Fair Value Services provide global asset managers and owners with tailored solutions to meet the increasing demands for robust valuation processes in alternative assets.  These services offer fair valuations for private equity, venture capital, and illiquid debt, along with assurance reviews and private company credit assessments. By leveraging decades of valuation experience and deep domain knowledge, S&P Global helps clients scale their operations, enhance efficiency and risk management, and achieve independence in valuations, crucial for DDQs, fundraising, and LP expectations.

Key Features.Description: Offers fair valuations for private equity, venture capital, and illiquid debt, covering a wide range of alternative asset classes.
Provides objective valuations to mitigate conflicts of interest, essential for valuation committees, financial reporting, and investor confidence.
Ensures valuations are compliant with industry standards including IPEV, US GAAP, and IFRS, and is SSAE 18 Type II certified, facilitating best practices.
Features a world-class team of CFAs, accountants, and MBAs with extensive and diverse experience in valuation across various financial domains.
Leverages a broad range of proprietary data, including bonds, loans, indices, and the expertise of S&P Global's analysts, ensuring current and meaningful assumptions.
Provides a secure SaaS platform for document exchange, audit tracking, portfolio analysis, and real-time data visualization, enhancing operational efficiency.
Assists clients through external audits with full audit support and documentation, streamlining the reporting process.
Supports various applications including independent valuations, transfer pricing, liquidity events, and leveraging market data insights, catering to diverse client needs.

Product Overview.Overview: The Private Equity Investment Criteria dataset, provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence, offers detailed insights into the current investment preferences of public and private investment firms and funds. This dataset is designed to empower users to identify potential investment opportunities by providing crucial information on financial ranges, geographic focuses, industry interests, and preferred lifecycle stages and transaction types. Compiled through direct firm communication and public domain sources, this dataset is an essential tool for anyone seeking to navigate and understand the private equity investment landscape.

Key Features.Description: Understand the financial parameters investment firms consider, including investment amounts, enterprise value, revenue, and EBITDA ranges.
Identify the specific geographic regions and countries targeted by investment firms for private equity deals.
Discover the diverse industries that are of interest to various investment firms, enabling sector-specific opportunity identification.
Determine the preferred development stages of companies that investment firms are likely to invest in, from early stage to mature.
Understand the types of transactions (e.g., buyouts, growth equity) that align with specific investment firm strategies.
Access a comprehensive dataset covering 36,000 companies globally, offering a broad market perspective.
Leverage data dating back to 1999, enabling trend analysis and historical comparisons.
Integrate the data seamlessly through various channels, including API, Cloud, Desktop, and Data Feeds across multiple platforms.

Product Overview.Overview: The Private Investment Benchmarks, offered in collaboration with Cambridge Associates, provide a trusted, widely adopted, and informed resource for measuring private investment performance. Leveraging high-quality, aggregate fund-level performance data sourced directly from fund managers' financial statements, these benchmarks are considered the industry standard for private equity, venture capital, real estate, and private credit. They serve as essential tools for investors looking to select fund managers, monitor performance, manage risk, and identify investment opportunities across private capital markets.

Key Features.Description: Recognized as the most trusted and widely adopted benchmarks for investors in private markets for over two decades.
Benchmarks are based on financial statements sourced directly from investment fund managers.
Manager-reported performance is independently verified from quarterly and annual audited financial statements.
Incorporates four decades of experience investing in private capital markets, designed by investors for investors.
Offers depth and breadth across all major fund asset classes, strategies, and geographies, with data dating back as early as the 1980s from over 9,500 funds.
Indices are calculated using institutional-quality funds, defined as closed-ended, co-mingled funds investing third-party capital.
Available via a comprehensive Data Feed for broad application or as Individual Reports for internal and personal use.
Supports key investor activities including performance measurement, risk management, valuation, asset allocation, and due diligence.

Product Overview.Overview: S&P Global Market Intelligence offers Private Market Valuation services, specializing in Private Equity and Debt Fair Value. These solutions are designed to assist firms in navigating the complexities of private market valuations by providing deep domain expertise, proprietary software, and a robust valuation control framework. Clients benefit from streamlined processes, transparent reporting, and flexible delivery options tailored to their specific needs, ultimately reducing operational burdens and key-person risk while ensuring consistency and scalability across diverse portfolios.

Key Features.Description: Leverage deep domain expertise with qualified valuation experts dedicated to private market valuations.
Ensure accuracy and compliance with a robust valuation control framework and comprehensive audit trail.
Choose from flexible delivery options including software, services, and managed services to suit your operational model.
Utilize proprietary software and robust data assets for enhanced valuation accuracy and efficiency.
Experience a streamlined valuation process and reporting for faster and more efficient workflows.
Achieve transparency and consistency in valuations across diverse portfolios and asset classes.
Obtain support for even the most complex valuation requirements within private markets.
Benefit from a scalable valuation process designed to handle large portfolios efficiently.

Product Overview.Overview: Unlock your private markets sustainability potential with our comprehensive suite of solutions.  Designed to accelerate your ESG strategy, our offerings leverage market intelligence, data-driven insights, and advanced analytics to provide clarity and drive impactful sustainability initiatives across your private market investments.

Key Features.Description: Access deep financial intelligence and analytics to evaluate the sustainability performance of private companies and funds.
Leverage independent credit ratings and research to understand ESG risks and opportunities within private market debt instruments.
Streamline your private market portfolio management with robust data management and reporting capabilities, enabling efficient tracking of ESG metrics.
Gain insights into macroeconomic trends and industry-specific data that can inform your sustainability-focused investment decisions.

Analyze and quantify ESG-related risks in private market portfolios to make informed risk management decisions.
Enhance supply chain transparency and assess sustainability risks within private market portfolio companies' supply chains.
Evaluate the environmental impact of energy-related investments within private markets and identify sustainable opportunities.

Product Overview.Overview: Process Economics Program (PEP) is the world's leading online resource for chemical process economics, providing access to an extensive database of over 2,000 process technologies covering 600+ chemicals across 6 regions. Designed for professionals in chemical, energy, engineering, and investment sectors, PEP offers unbiased, expert-driven insights through comprehensive PEP Reports and Reviews, along with the interactive iPEP Navigator tool. This powerful platform enables users to quickly compare technical designs and production costs, evaluate the impact of changing market conditions, and customize data to specific project requirements, facilitating faster, cost-effective decision-making in technology selection and investment strategies.

Key Features.Description: Access the world's largest online process economics database with 2,000+ process technologies, ensuring a broad and deep understanding of available options.
Explore data for over 600 chemicals, providing wide-ranging insights across the chemical industry landscape.
Analyze process economics across 6 key regions, understanding geographical variations and market-specific factors.
Rely on expert-authored PEP Reports and Reviews for objective and trustworthy evaluations of new process technologies.
Utilize the iPEP Navigator to tailor process economics data to your specific project parameters and needs.
Quickly compare technical designs and production costs, facilitating efficient and informed technology selection.
Stay informed on the latest technology, market, and regulatory developments impacting chemical and fuel production.
Make well-informed investment and production decisions based on unbiased data and expert analysis, reducing risk and maximizing opportunities.

Product Overview.Overview: The S&P Capital IQ Professionals dataset provides comprehensive profiles of over 30 million professionals globally, including public and private company executives, board members, and investment professionals. This dataset offers detailed information such as biographies, contact data, education, compensation history going back to 1992 for public companies, job titles, and affiliations, enabling users to gain deep insights into individuals' career histories and professional networks for informed decision-making.

Key Features.Description: Access detailed individual profiles encompassing biography, contact information, education history, compensation details, professional affiliations, and corporate board membership data.
Explore a vast database of over 30 million professionals worldwide, providing a broad and diverse range of individual profiles.
Review compensation history extending back to 1992 for professionals in public companies, enabling trend analysis and benchmarking.
Utilize standardized job titles and functions to efficiently pinpoint key decision-makers within organizations and industries.
Understand individuals' professional journeys and relationships by accessing current and prior company affiliations and roles.
Leverage data integrated across public and private companies globally, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of the professional landscape.
Benefit from S&P Global Market Intelligence's reputation for delivering accurate, deep, and insightful data solutions.
Access user guides, data schemas, and dedicated support channels for seamless data integration and utilization.

Product Overview.Overview: ProntoNLP Transcript Analytics is a dataset designed for in-depth analysis of Machine Readable Transcripts. Leveraging Natural Language Processing and a Large Language Model, it efficiently extracts key insights from transcripts, focusing on performance metrics and future corporate performance indicators. This tool helps users cut through noise and identify crucial information, enabling them to understand supply chain vulnerabilities, inflation risks, financial statement validity, and strategic shifts within companies.

Key Features.Description: Rank companies facing supply chain challenges by analyzing transcript references to freight, logistics, and related issues.
Track and measure inflation risk over time based on transcript data.
Support the validation of financial statements by analyzing transcript content.
Identify key corporate strategic shifts, such as companies newly pursuing inorganic growth.
Quickly process and extract valuable insights from Machine Readable Transcripts.
Accurately recognize and score important phrases using advanced Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models.
Effectively filter out noise and highlight valuable information within transcripts.
Generate key performance indicators for assessing future corporate performance.

Product Overview.Overview: Prospect Match is an AI-powered sales enablement and productivity solution designed to empower Sales and Marketing Executives and Relationship Managers. By combining unique data with machine learning models, Prospect Match scores and ranks companies based on their attractiveness and product needs. This enables users to effectively target high-potential prospects, prioritize efforts, and drive revenue growth by focusing on companies most likely to engage in new banking relationships.

Key Features.Description: Easily identify and focus on the most attractive prospects based on data-driven scores and rankings.
Proactively identify and address potential attrition risks before revenue is lost, ensuring client retention.
Uncover opportunities to expand wallet share within existing client relationships by identifying unmet needs.
Facilitate more effective pre-call planning with detailed company-level information, leading to stronger first calls.
Identify specific product needs for each company, enabling a tailored and consultative selling strategy.
Eliminate information overload by providing key indicators of prospect attractiveness in a clear and consumable format.
Free up Relationship Managers' time from data analysis, allowing them to focus on consultative sales engagements.
Prospect Match scores can be seamlessly integrated with existing bank internal sales enablement systems for wider accessibility.

Product Overview.Overview: ProSpread™ is a solution designed to optimize financial spreading by automating data extraction from various documents and integrating with S&P Global's credit risk platforms. Utilizing NLP and OCR, it minimizes manual data entry and streamlines the workflow from document upload to data analysis, enabling users to efficiently gain valuable insights.

Key Features.Description: Extracts data from PDFs and images using OCR, ensuring consistent and uniform financial spreading with guided verification and auditability.
Maps extracted financials to a standard chart of accounts, enabling portfolio-wide comparability and supporting multiple languages.
Integrates with Credit Analytics for auto-scoring and offers secure data delivery via APIs, enhancing the risk assessment workflow.
Minimizes manual data entry, allowing more time for high-ROI analysis and strategic tasks.
User-friendly interface and excel-like design reduce training and onboarding time.
Machine learning capabilities learn from user interactions, improving automation and accuracy over time.
Maps data to the Capital IQ standard chart of accounts, facilitating apples-to-apples comparisons.

Product Overview.Overview: Gain complete transparency and stay ahead of market shifts in the dynamic protein market with our comprehensive data and insights service. Covering animal protein from crops to animal feed, our expanded coverage offers daily price assessments, market analyses, and forecasts for beef, poultry, seafood, pork, dairy, and eggs.  Spot opportunities and mitigate risks with real-time intelligence on supply, demand, and pricing, empowering informed decisions in the agriculture and food sectors.

Key Features.Description: Access up-to-date daily assessments of beef, poultry, seafood, and animal feed prices to track market fluctuations and inform trading strategies.
Leverage detailed market analyses, price assessments, and forecasts specifically designed for the beef and poultry industries to navigate this ever-evolving sector.
Enhance your understanding of the global pork market with dedicated price assessments and comprehensive analytics, focusing on key exporting and importing regions.
Dive into global seafood markets including shrimp, salmon, crab, and tuna with in-depth coverage of supply, demand, trade, and market prices.
Access vital insights into dairy prices and production trends with weekly updates and global/regional outlooks for the dairy complex.
Stay informed on market dynamics with regional and global outlook reports for beef, poultry, pork, and dairy, providing a broader perspective.
Receive timely updates on beef, dairy, pork, and egg markets with weekly reports that summarize key trends and price movements.
Proactively identify market opportunities and mitigate potential risks by leveraging real-time data and expert analysis of protein market dynamics.

Product Overview.Overview: Proxy Voting, a solution from S&P Global Market Intelligence (originally IHS Markit), automates the complex processes of meetings, proxy voting, and shareholder identification disclosure, ensuring SRDII compliance. It addresses the inefficiencies and risks associated with manual processing in these areas by providing a comprehensive platform to manage global meeting coverage and voting agendas.  This solution aims to enhance operational efficiency, minimize errors, and deliver significant value to financial intermediaries by streamlining workflows and offering a robust, adaptable system.

Key Features.Description: Automates the entire lifecycle of meetings, proxy voting, and shareholder ID disclosure, reducing manual intervention.
Designed to meet the requirements of the Shareholder Rights Directive II, ensuring regulatory adherence.
Supports processing for meetings and voting agendas across global markets, accommodating diverse market nuances.
Standardizes and streamlines workflows for improved processing speed and reduced operational overhead.
Minimizes processing errors and reputational risks associated with manual tasks in critical voting processes.
Supports various business segments or geographical locations within a single implementation for flexible deployment.
Enables operations teams to monitor, prioritize, and manage meeting processing tasks and exceptions efficiently.
Offers a shared, single code base solution for multiple customers, leading to a lower total cost of ownership over time.

Product Overview.Overview: The Public Finance Automated Scoring Tool (PFAST) dataset streamlines municipal credit scoring by providing timely financial, economic, and environmental information. It offers a transparent framework for assessing credit risk, delivering probability of default scores aligned with S&P Global Ratings criteria. Covering over 30,000 municipal entities across various public finance segments and updated monthly since 2016, PFAST automates credit scoring, enabling quick understanding of credit quality changes and key risk factor identification.

Key Features.Description: Scores thousands of municipal entities in minutes, significantly reducing manual effort in credit risk assessment.
Integrates financial, economic, and environmental data for a holistic and multi-faceted view of creditworthiness.
Provides both overall credit scores and specific risk indicators, offering a layered approach to understanding credit risk drivers.
Includes over 30,000 rated and unrated entities across key US public finance sectors like local governments, utilities, healthcare, education, and transportation.
Data is updated monthly, ensuring access to the latest financial reports and economic information for up-to-date analysis.
Offers data from 2016 to present, enabling trend analysis and historical performance comparisons.
Credit scores are broadly aligned with S&P Global Ratings criteria, providing industry-recognized benchmarks for credit risk assessment.
Delivered via API for seamless integration into existing workflows and systems, facilitating efficient data access and utilization.

Product Overview.Overview: The Purchasing Managers' Index™ (PMI™) dataset, compiled by S&P Global, offers a timely and comprehensive view of economic health across over 40 global economies. Derived from monthly surveys of senior executives at private sector companies, PMI data provides a headline index indicating overall economic direction, along with detailed sub-indices covering key drivers such as GDP, inflation, and employment. Financial and corporate professionals leverage PMI data to gain early insights into economic trends, understand market dynamics, and identify potential opportunities for informed decision-making.

Key Features.Description: Access monthly PMI data released ahead of official statistics, providing an early and reliable gauge of economic trends and turning points.
Monitor economic performance across 40+ countries, gaining a comprehensive understanding of the global economic landscape.
Analyze business cycle trends within 30+ detailed sectors, enabling granular analysis of industry-specific dynamics and performance.
Explore sub-indices covering GDP, inflation, exports, employment, and more, facilitating in-depth analysis of critical economic factors.
Track supply delays and price pressures across 20+ commodities, gaining valuable insights into supply chain dynamics and inflationary pressures.
Utilize PMI Comment Trackers to understand the real-world impact of economic trends on global businesses, revealing underlying market drivers.
Access dedicated PMI datasets for sectors like electronics and metal users, providing focused intelligence for specific industry analysis.
Integrate PMI data seamlessly into your workflows with delivery options including API, Cloud, and Feed, ensuring convenient access and utilization.

Product Overview.Overview: PVR Source is an online due diligence platform and web-based portal designed to help fund boards meet SEC Rule 2a-5 compliance for fair value determination. It provides a centralized space to access essential documentation like methodology reports, backtesting studies, and aggregated challenge statistics for fixed income and derivatives valuations. By offering readily available data and transparency metrics, PVR Source supports effective compliance management, modernizes valuation practices, and provides information that can be easily presented to the board.

Key Features.Description: Hosts methodology documents, reports, and support documentation in one easy-to-access location.
Provides the necessary framework and transparency metrics to help fund boards comply with valuation requirements.
Offers detailed challenge statistics and back-testing studies across asset classes like fixed income and derivatives.
Includes due diligence presentations and videos to assist understanding and validation processes.
Information delivery can be direct or via a Fund Administrator, adapting to client needs.
Provides a mechanism to request additional, tailored data specific to a portfolio.
Key reports and information are updated quarterly to ensure currency and relevance.

Product Overview.Overview: Qval Valuation Solutions, originating from IHS Markit and now offered by S&P Global Market Intelligence, is an AI-powered software solution designed for asset managers with private market investments, particularly in private equity, growth equity, and venture capital. It addresses the critical need for accurate and efficient private asset valuation for investor reporting and audit compliance. Qval automates valuation workflows, facilitates audit preparation with professional reports, and integrates market data, enabling users to update valuations quickly, maintain valuation policy alignment, and leverage industry best practices. This audit-tested solution has a proven track record, having processed over 10,000 cap table and COI filings and automated over 95,000 portfolio valuations.

Key Features.Description: Streamline routine reporting and refocus team efforts on value generation by automating valuation processes, freeing up valuable time.
Generate professional, one-click valuation reports that meet auditor standards, simplifying audit preparations and ensuring compliance.
Save time and improve accuracy with direct access to essential market data, including public comparables, risk-free rates, and currency conversions, directly within the platform.
Utilize Qval's reporting suite to easily generate cap tables, ownership calculations, and detailed valuation reports, providing intuitive and insightful outputs.
Value diverse Level 3 assets effectively using a wide range of industry-standard valuation methodologies supported by Qval, ensuring adaptability to various asset types.
Receive guidance and support from a team of valuation experts during implementation and ongoing training on best practices, maximizing solution effectiveness and user proficiency.
Improve data visibility and operational efficiency by seamlessly syncing financial data between Qval and iLEVEL portfolio monitoring software, fostering a unified data environment.
Increase confidence in valuation accuracy and consistency, enabling better responses to investor inquiries and ensuring alignment with firm-wide policies and industry best practices.

Product Overview.Overview: Rating Evaluation Service (RES) is a confidential tool designed to provide rated and unrated entities with a forward-looking assessment of the potential credit impact of strategic initiatives before they are implemented. By submitting hypothetical scenarios, users receive timely feedback from a Rating Evaluation Committee, allowing them to understand the credit consequences of decisions related to capital programs, debt management, operational changes, and security issuance.  It is important to note that RES is not a credit rating or a consulting service, but rather a dedicated assessment tool for informed strategic planning.

Key Features.Description: Gain valuable insight into the potential credit impact of your strategic initiatives *before* you act, enabling proactive planning.
Receive tailored feedback from a Rating Evaluation Committee based on the specific hypothetical scenarios you provide, ensuring relevant and actionable insights.
The Rating Evaluation Service process and its outcomes remain strictly confidential, maintaining your privacy and strategic advantage.
Assess how major strategic decisions, such as capital programs or acquisitions, can affect your creditworthiness, facilitating informed decision-making.
Pinpoint planned initiatives that are likely to lead to more favorable credit outcomes, allowing you to optimize your strategic approach.
Utilize RES for a wide range of strategic initiatives, including mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, capital planning, and restructuring efforts.
Obtain crucial feedback and valuable insights *before* committing to strategic moves, reducing risk and enhancing strategic confidence.
Receive a clear and documented confidential written assessment of the potential credit impacts, providing a tangible and shareable output for internal stakeholders.

Product Overview.Overview: Ratings360® is a personalized dashboard designed for rated issuers, providing a comprehensive understanding of their credit profile. It consolidates essential ratings data, in-depth risk research, and critical market insights into a single platform. This empowers users to efficiently manage, compare, and report on their credit story, benchmark against peers, and stay ahead of industry trends, all while accessing vital data and intelligence to inform strategic decisions.

Key Features.Description: Easily view and compare your organization's ratings against industry peers, suppliers, and counterparties for performance context.
Stay informed with access to extensive research and analysis, helping you anticipate and understand key industry dynamics.
Tailor the dashboard to display the data that is most relevant and meaningful to your specific needs and priorities.
Access S&P Global Ratings' analytical approach and public evaluations on sustainability to highlight your ESG performance.
Gain insights into aggregated investor sentiment across sectors to confidently propose funding options and understand market perspectives.
Access your organization's ratings, historical data, and related research articles for a complete credit history overview.
Compare financial scores, adjusted financials, and key ratios against peers and competitors for detailed financial analysis.
Utilize scenario builders to create hypothetical situations and understand the impact on your credit rating based on S&P Global Ratings' methodology.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsDirect® on S&P Capital IQ Pro is a comprehensive platform delivering all the essential credit ratings data and insightful analytics needed for in-depth credit risk assessment.  With a focus on a faster and reimagined user experience, RatingsDirect® empowers users to gain a holistic understanding of credit risk, providing a powerful tool for efficient and informed decision-making in today's complex financial landscape.

Key Features.Description: Access a vast repository of credit ratings and related data from S&P Global Ratings. Benefit: Centralized access to all necessary credit information in one place.
Leverage S&P Global's expert analysis and research to gain deeper insights from credit ratings data. Benefit: Make informed decisions with clear, analytical perspectives.
Experience a faster, more intuitive platform designed for efficient navigation and data retrieval. Benefit: Save time and improve productivity with a streamlined workflow.
Obtain a holistic understanding of credit risk across various sectors and geographies. Benefit: Develop a complete picture of risk exposure for better strategic planning.
Seamlessly integrates with the broader S&P Capital IQ Pro platform for expanded capabilities. Benefit: Access a wider range of financial intelligence tools and datasets.
Key Features.Feature: Integration with S&P Capital IQ Pro

Key Features.Description: Stay ahead with access to the latest credit rating updates and news as they happen. Benefit: Ensure timely and accurate risk assessments with up-to-date information.
Tailor your analysis with flexible tools and features to meet specific research requirements. Benefit: Conduct focused and efficient analysis aligned to your unique needs.
Access resources and support to maximize your utilization of the RatingsDirect® platform. Benefit: Ensure smooth operation and get assistance when needed to optimize your workflow.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsXpress®: Credit Ratings provides comprehensive access to S&P Global Ratings data, covering a wide range of asset classes and issuers including corporations, sovereigns, structured finance, and public finance entities. This dataset offers current and historical credit ratings, CreditWatch, and Outlook assessments with varying frequencies, encompassing nearly one million securities globally. It empowers users to perform sophisticated financial analysis such as back testing, risk management benchmarking, investment policy guideline testing, and counterparty risk assessment, making it an essential resource for developing robust financial models and gaining deep insights into credit risk.

Key Features.Description: Access credit ratings data across global issuers and diverse asset classes including corporations, sovereigns, and structured finance.
Includes Rating, CreditWatch, and Outlook assessments with corresponding dates for a complete view of credit risk.

Utilize data for back testing models, risk management, investment policy testing, and assessing counterparty risk.
Delivered via API, Cloud, and Feed with platform options like API Drive, Marketplace Workbench, Snowflake, and XpressAPI for flexible integration.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsXpress®: Macroeconomics dataset from S&P Global Ratings provides comprehensive historic and forecast data on major global macroeconomic indicators across 129 economies.  Covering key factors such as CPI, GDP, employment, and more, this dataset allows users to monitor economic conditions across four major regions and identify market changes and emerging risks, enabling more informed investment decisions.

Key Features.Description: Access macroeconomic data for 129 economies worldwide, providing a broad view of global markets.
Includes forecasts for 67 crucial macroeconomic indicators, such as CPI, GDP, employment, and trade balances.

Provides a complete picture with historical, current, and future projections for informed decision-making.
Data sourced from S&P Global Ratings, ensuring high-quality, expert-backed macroeconomic insights.
Available via API, Cloud, and Feed, and accessible on platforms like Snowflake and Xpressfeed™ for easy integration.
Updated monthly to provide the latest macroeconomic forecasts and data.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsXpress®: Research provides access to digitized credit research reports from S&P Global Ratings, covering a wide range of asset classes including global issuers, sovereigns, structured finance, and US public finance. This dataset is designed for data scientists, research teams, and quantitative strategists who need textual data for investment analysis, credit risk modeling, and sentiment analysis. It includes various article types such as news, research updates, full analysis, summary analysis, and commentary, dating back to 1994 with significant coverage from 2008, making it a valuable resource for understanding credit markets and developing predictive models.

Key Features.Description: Access a vast library of research reports published by S&P Global Ratings, a leading provider of credit ratings and research.
Explore research across various asset classes including corporations, banks, insurance, sovereigns, structured finance, and public finance.
Gain insights from multiple perspectives with access to news, research updates, in-depth analysis, summaries, and expert commentary.

Integrate data seamlessly into your workflows via API, Cloud, and Feed delivery channels, including Marketplace Workbench, Snowflake, XpressAPI, and Xpressfeed™.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsXpress®: Research Core News provides a comprehensive dataset of credit research news, delivering nearly 3,000 current English-language articles in a machine-readable format. This dataset facilitates easy integration of credit research news into your content and solutions, supporting text analysis workflows with bulk delivery of active news articles and associated metadata. It encompasses various news types, including News Comments, Rating Actions, Bulletins, and Press Releases, offering a rich source of information derived from S&P Global Ratings.

Key Features.Description: Access nearly 3,000 of the most current English-language news articles related to credit research, ensuring a broad and up-to-date information base.
Includes News Comments, Rating Actions, Bulletins, and Press Releases, providing varied perspectives and insights on credit-related events.

Available via API, Cloud, and Feed delivery channels, and platforms like FTP, Snowflake, and XpressAPI, providing flexible integration options.

Product Overview.Overview: RatingsXpress®: Scores & Factors is a dataset from S&P Global Market Intelligence that provides deep transparency into the methodology behind S&P Global Ratings' Issuer Credit Ratings. By offering access to the underlying business, financial, industry, and economic risk factors considered by analysts, along with the stand-alone credit profile, this dataset empowers users to understand the drivers of credit ratings, create financial benchmarks, monitor credit quality shifts, and differentiate between issuers, while also aiding banks in Basel III regulatory compliance by decoupling issuer credit risk from external support.

Key Features.Description: Create meaningful financial benchmarks for internal risk models, particularly when assessing the impact of weakening external support.
Gain deeper insights into potential shifts in an entity's credit quality by tracking the underlying components influencing its rating.
Better distinguish between issuers with the same credit rating by evaluating their business risk profile, industry risk, and competitive positioning.
Decouple issuer credit risk from external credit support, crucial for banks adhering to Basel III regulations.
Access historical data for various sectors including corporations, banks, insurers, sovereigns, and Banking Industry & Country Risk Assessments (BICRA), dating back to 2017.
Available in daily or monthly frequencies to suit different monitoring and analysis needs.
Encompasses 3,900 companies globally across diverse industries, providing extensive market representation.
Delivered via API, Cloud, Desktop, or Feed, and accessible through various platforms like XpressAPI, Snowflake, and S&P Capital IQ Pro, ensuring seamless integration into existing workflows.

Product Overview.Overview: Reference Entity Data (RED), originating from IHS Markit and now offered by S&P Global Market Intelligence, is a comprehensive dataset of verified global CDS reference data designed to streamline trading, enhance risk management, and ensure regulatory compliance.  It provides essential information on entities, obligations, corporate actions, and credit events, including unique RED codes for trade confirmation and index data for CDS index trading. This dataset is crucial for financial institutions needing reliable and validated data for CDS operations and regulatory reporting.

Key Features.Description: Access verified information on entities, obligations, corporate actions, and credit events to support accurate CDS trading and reduce trade breaks.
Utilize unique alphanumeric RED codes to confirm trades on platforms like MarkitSERV and ensure compliance with DTCC mandates for CDS index trade confirmations.
Stay informed with regularly released summaries detailing debt movements, corporate actions, CDS succession events, and credit events.
Leverage verified index and constituent information for credit indices, including updated weightings and index factors, essential for index tracking and trading.
Utilize validated data to meet regulatory requirements and ensure accurate reporting in CDS markets.
Employ reliable reference data to improve risk assessment and management related to CDS trading activities.
Streamline CDS trade confirmations and reduce operational risks with standardized and validated RED codes.
Benefit from global coverage across various industries, providing a wide scope of reference data for diverse financial instruments.

Product Overview.Overview: Navigate the complexities of the global refined oil product markets with S&P Global's Refining & Marketing service. This comprehensive resource provides in-depth insight, data, and analysis essential for strategic decision-making in the downstream sector. Designed for strategic planners, business development professionals, and investment decision makers, this service delivers country-level projections, refinery asset details, retail market intelligence, and expert perspectives to empower informed investment strategies, policy evaluations, and a mastery of global and regional market dynamics.

Product Overview.Overview: The Refining Margins & Crude Arbitrage dataset delivers comprehensive insights into crude refining profitability across seven major global refining hubs.  It equips users with crucial data to evaluate the financial attractiveness of refining diverse crude grades in various locations and refinery configurations. By providing arbitrage calculations for approximately 1,500 scenarios, this dataset enables a thorough comparison of refining economics, facilitating informed decisions in crude procurement and refining operations.

Key Features.Description: Access data spanning key refining centers including the U.S. Gulf Coast, Europe, and Singapore, providing a worldwide view of refining margins.

Leverage 10 years of historical data reported daily, monthly, and yearly, enabling robust trend analysis and historical benchmarking.

From pre-trade checks to investor lifecycle management, we provide the tools to accelerate time to market, enrich investor experiences, and maintain a competitive edge in the evolving private markets landscape.

Streamline and scale entity and investor lifecycle management with a configurable workflow hub for clear visibility and coordination.

Product Overview.Overview: The Renewable Capture Price Forecast dataset, provided by S&P Commodity Insights, offers projections of renewable energy capture prices in Europe through 2050. With regional and country-level forecasts available at annual or monthly intervals, it's an essential resource for understanding the evolving economics of renewable energy in Europe.

Product Overview.Overview: Research Manager is a cloud-based solution designed for asset managers to efficiently manage their entire research evaluation and payments process.  This adaptable platform is built to align with post-MiFID II best practices, offering flexibility for diverse buy-side budgeting and evaluation workflows. It streamlines operations, reduces time for investment professionals by pre-filtering interactions, and supports various funding methods including CSAs, soft dollars, and more.  With optional managed services and robust commission management capabilities, Research Manager empowers both buy-side and sell-side firms to optimize research workflows, ensure compliance, and enhance decision-making.

Product Overview.Overview: Research Signals, originating from IHS Markit and now offered by S&P Global Market Intelligence, provides a comprehensive suite of fully-integrated research and signal management services.  Standardized across indicators and regions, this dataset empowers users to enhance performance analysis, generate research insights, develop investment ideas, analyze portfolio exposure, and build bespoke models.  It includes a variety of factors such as CDS to Equity, Dividend Forecast, Short Squeeze Model, and Short Sentiment, offering deep insights into credit risk, dividend forecasts, and short selling dynamics.

Dividend Forecast Factors leverage forecasted dividends to deliver yield, growth, and payout ratio signals across global equities.

Product Overview.Overview: The Retail Flow dataset from S&P Global Market Intelligence offers deep insights into individual investor behavior, a crucial and increasingly influential segment of the equity market. By tracking actual retail trades, this dataset exposes market trends and sentiment, helping users improve alpha strategies and manage risk. It provides granular, security-level data dating back to 2017 across US trading venues and ETFs, offering a unique alternative data source that complements traditional financial indicators for enhanced market analysis.

Key Features.Description: Gain direct insight into retail investor activity with a suite of indicators derived from actual retail trades.
